title: Liebmann
des: The teacher Antek Liebmann moves to the French countryside to leave his former life in Germany behind. He soon gets a job and finds himself in a new relationship. But the strange energy of a near-by artists residency and an unexpected visitor from Germany make him realise he cannot escape his memories. He has to find his own way to confront the ghosts of his past.
cast: Godehard Giese, Adeline Moreau, Fabien Ara, Bettina Grahs

title: Persona Q: Shadow of the Labyrinth
des: Persona 3 and 4 protagonists meet and do stuff.
cast: Yui Horie, Akira Ishida, Yûki Kaji, Ami Koshimizu

title: El Ganzo
des: Identity and self-discovery evolve in an epic journey through the majesty of a Mexico rarely seen. EL GANZO chronicles a brief and intense connection between two lonely travelers: a struggling artist on the verge of a creative breakthrough and a mysterious woman with a hidden and unknown past.
cast: Susan Traylor, Anslem Richardson, Mark Booker, Magdalena del Rio

title: Design of the Heart
des: Add a Plot
cast: Kareena Clark

title: Onaatah: Of the Earth
des: What do you do when life reaches a dead end? Giving up is an option,but certainly not the only or the best option.
cast: Merlvin Mukhim, Sweety Pala

title: 234 Shuo ai ni
des: An aspiring actor takes on a case that requires her to assume a false identity. In hopes of preparing for the lead role in a play, she agrees to trick a man into taking her as his mistress, but things escalate far more than she had originally planned.
cast: Ariel Lin, Hao Qin, Heng-Yin Chou, Peggy Tseng

title: Whatever Makes You Happy
des: Based on Leo Tolstoy's Anna Karenina, Whatever Makes You Happy is an exploration of the all too common trappings of dissatisfaction and infidelity in the relationships of urban twenty somethings. Anna is a practical and bookish grad student. She lives a comfortable, yet safe life of study, friends, and her long time boyfriend Kevin. Alex is a musician, living the carefree urban hipster lifestyle, perfectly happy to coast through life unencumbered. Everything changes when by chance Anna and Alex meet through friends and connect in a way neither of them expected. This unlikely pair start a fiercely heated affair, putting both of their worlds in jeopardy. Is what they have together enough to survive the damage it causes?
cast: Rachel Delante, Tyler Peck, Alex Aspiazu, Benjamin Becker

title: Hollywood in my Huis
des: Set against the backdrop of 2004's Matric dance, JANA VAN TONDER a wallflower who lives in an impoverished railway neighborhood with her dysfunctional parents, watches the Oscars and becomes inspired to secure her very own Hollywood red carpet moment at the up and coming MATRIC FAREWELL DANCE. Then her high school crush BRANDON breaks up with his long time girlfriend and Jana has to find the courage to ask him to the dance. Meanwhile her best-friend and boy-next-door FRIKKIE is finally motivated to reveal his secret crush on her. With only ONE MONTH to go... Jana soon finds herself in the middle of a love triangle between her closest friend and dream date.
cast: Christia Visser, Edwin van der Walt, Nicola Hanekom, Louw Venter

title: Trooper
des: A story of a father and son, two veterans from two very different Wars, helping each other to get through each day, and heal the wounds of War.
cast: Max Martini, Robert Walden, Christopher Martini, Suzanne DiDonna

title: Star Power
des: Add a Plot
cast: John Campbell-Mac, Anna Easteden, Joe O'Dell, Nathalie Walker

title: Somewhere Tonight
des: A pair of lonely lovers meet while chatting on a phone sex line.
cast: Max Casella, John Turturro, Elizabeth Marvel, Lynn Cohen

title: Sleepless in New York
des: Love is the best thing in life - until it's over. Heartbreak affects us all. Oscar-nominated director Christian Frei teams with famed anthropologist Helen Fisher to examine the power and resilience of love despite it all.
cast: Helen Fisher, Michael Hariton, Rosey La Rouge, Alley Scott

title: The Love Patient
des: Paul is a success who has gone stale with his work and his life. He has lost the love of his life but they are still co-workers. So he decides to "get" cancer so he can be popular again with Brad. When the (supposedly fake) test result comes back, he is diagnosed with an actual spot on his lungs which has "metastasized" and he is put to bed rest and on a drug regimen. But is the diagnosis real or faked or an "intervention" by his friends, co-workers and ex-lover... His family and friends do, in fact, assemble around him and hilarity ensues - with some familial bickering.
cast: Benjamin Lutz, John Werskey, Jackson Palmer, Madison Gray

title: About Abby
des: A cock-eyed optimist searches for love in the cold world of Los Angeles. Supported by her two more realistic best friends Micah & Caroline, Abby begins her undying quest to find true love...and maybe a little fun too.
cast: Keghan Hurst, Ashley Reign, Gabe Pasillas, Lisa Younger

title: Broken Gardenias
des: Broken Gardenias is a Dark Comedy about Jenni, an orphaned semi-savant, who with the help of a street hustler named Sam, steal a car and head to Los Angeles to find Jenni's, father whom she hasn't seen or heard from since she was 6.
cast: Alma S. Grey, A. Jack Morocco, Caroline Heinle, Louis Dezseran

title: Groove
des: Melanie, a New York City subway musician, prepares for an underground music contest with the help of a former rock star while trying to balance her working class background with her artistic ambitions.
cast: Adrian Enscoe, Cameron Fuller, Clara McGregor, Samuel Kay Forrest

title: Geography of the Heart
des: Ambitious actor's agent - Felix (Clemens Schick) is at the top of his game in Germany and internationally - repping his hugely successful actress fiancée Rachel (Heike Makatsch). Life, on the surface, could not be better - except for two things; Felix's mother has been recently diagnosed with Alzheimers and his father, Hans (Hans Michael Rehberg) - struggles to cope. Felix's other discord is the nagging sense that 'something' is missing from his perfect life. Then Felix meets real estate agent Anna (Jana Pallaske) when viewing an apartment he and Rachel are to buy - and he discovers the one feeling he would give up everything for.
cast: Clemens Schick, Heike Makatsch, Jana Pallaske, Hans-Michael Rehberg

title: Kosnice
des: Thursday morning. Zagreb, Jerusalem, London, Cologne, Prague. Five people. Getting up. Going to work. In five cities-hives, like bees. Looking for the sweeter life then the one they are living now.
cast: Akbar Kurtha, Stefan Lampadius, Nili Tserruya, Lubos Veselý
director: Boaz Debby, Simon Dolensky, Tomás Kratochvíl, Michael Lennox, Igor Seregi

title: Undone
des: UNDONE is a delicate and moving short about two straight-identified women (one younger, one older), who wake up one morning in the same bed. They've shared a moment of great intimacy but soon become estranged as they try to come to terms with the way they feel about each other and themselves.
cast: Georgia Curtis, Alexandra Gray, Adam Lannon

title: Once Upon a Time in London
des: Elliot a young man lives next door to Lucy, and is well aware of her existence as he spends a lot of his spare time spying on her until he finally gets to meet her....
cast: Amber Anderson, Craig Roberts

title: Break My Fall
des: Three days in the lives of four friends on the streets of East London. Girlfriends Liza and Sally have a band to pull together and a birthday to celebrate, yet from this moment on their lives will change forever.
cast: Kat Redstone, Sophie Anderson, Kai Brandon Ly, Collin Clay Chace

title: The Marriage of Reason & Squalor
des: A young girl visits the island that her fiance gave her as a wedding gift, only to find that it is full of surprises.
cast: Ronni Ancona, Nnenna Ani, Noma Dumezweni, Jenny Eclair

title: Mr. Engagement
des: Thomas Nichols thinks he has life beat. He's successful, handsome, has loving friends and family and a longtime girlfriend who adores him. How can he go wrong? By being unfaithful! One night it all comes to a halt when Lori catches him with another woman. He wants her back but the only problem is she doesn't want him. Some brainstorming with his buddies leads him to the elaborate though twisted scheme that he has to convince her of his changed ways by getting engaged. But when all the women he asks keep saying no it throws him into a serious predicament. Don't all women want to marry? What's going on! Beaten, he then sets out to romance the only woman left he can find showing any remote interest in him but when she says no he's left with no other choices but to seek his friends help once again. What results is more hilarious and entertaining advice leading to a series of attempts and failures at gaining her hand in marriage. But just when he's about to pop the question again. Lori wants him back. He then has to decide between her and Jamie which leads him to realize what he's been searching for all along has been right in front of him. But before he can reunite with Jamie he's got to win the approval of inter-office employee's. Prove he's changed and mended his womanizing ways, confess his scheme and convince her she's the only one for him. Will Jamie say yes? Or, will it be just another engagement.
cast: Rod Grant, Ashlie Dawn, Natalie Stavola, Ken Anthony II

title: Naked Angel
des: A man who wants to let go of life [Duval] falls in love with an angel who longs to be human [Watkins] and is inspired to live again.
cast: James Duval, Cameron Watkins, Debra Wilson, Kelly Perine

title: Almost
des: ALMOST is the story of a soaring love affair that never quite takes off. Emily & Tom meet and have a magnetic connection. They almost fall very much in love, however, fate intervenes and they can never be together. ALMOST explores the nature of attraction, love and memory.
cast: Maeve Dermody, Guy Edmonds, Toby Schmitz

title: Jasper
des: A private detective takes on one final case before retirement.
cast: Nathan Hill, Sandy Greenwood, Catherine Mack, Stewart Marshall

title: This Is Lipstick!
des: Secret cross-dresser Ronnie is able to quickly change clothes when his wife comes home from work early. But he doesn't get off that easy when she finds his lipstick stains and accuses him of cheating.
cast: Michael B. Moynahan, Valerie Hanna, Brie Bernstein, Sophia Card

title: They Wore Pink
des: Nothing is what it appears when a young woman meets a young man outside a wedding.
cast: Tygh Runyan, Lauren Lee Smith

title: Always
des: Liam Chan, a lawyer in Hong Kong, incidentally falls for Yan Li, a Shanghainese heiress to a hotel empire, where predestined obligations test their love.
cast: Derek Ting, Danni Wang, Philip Chan, Peter Shinkoda

title: Life Gets in the Way
des: A woman tries to pick up the pieces of a broken past and struggles with an unstable present in the big city of Los Angeles, where serious relationships are hard to find.
cast: Donna Mills, Julie Sabray, Geoff Reeves, Mackenzie Mason

title: 3's a Couple
des: Jimmy and Steven are best friends. They are complete opposites. They share everything, a house, bills, friends, and eventually... A girlfriend. Steven has been dating Michelle for two years, but when he breaks her heart, Jimmy is there for a shoulder to cry on. Or get drunk with. Too drunk. Jimmy and Michelle get caught in the throws of passion by Steven. Neither man willing to give her up, Michelle comes up with a plan to date both guys. She moves in with them and the relationship begins. Can it work?
cast: Robin Andre, Kim Argetsinger, Dante Basco, Dion Basco

title: It Is Decidedly So
des: Faced with the joy of a "just married" couple in Las Vegas, a woman's emotions take her on the ride of her life when she spots a man from afar.
cast: Aaron Davis, Julia Mayorga

title: Clear Lake
des: A young man, trapped in a dead-end life caring for his over-protective father, is offered a second chance to fulfill his boyhood dream. Taking it will change everyone he loves forever.
cast: Roddy Piper, Daryl Dorge, Sarah Murphy-Dyson, Leonard Waldner

title: Istanbul aku datang!
des: A young lady from Malaysia come to Istanbul just to meet her beloved boyfriend, but that naive girl doesn't know what will happen to her life there.
cast: Aizat Amdan, Beto Kusyairy, Emrah Ozdemir, Farid Ramlee

title: The Jealous Sea
des: The boyfriend of a handsome photographer tries to deal with his jealousy after finding nude photos he took of a gorgeous model.
cast: Sebastian Lysen, Kevin Ramirez, Rodiney Santiago

title: Graduation Afternoon
des: A bittersweet tale of young love based upon a short story by Stephen King.
cast: Georgia Groome, Sean Teale, Hannah Emmett

title: Mr Maple Leaf
des: We follow Alex on a stake-out to find a mysterious man.
cast: Teri Polo, Scott Foley, Ryan Hansen, Jillian Armenante

title: Bed Buddies
des: A comedy about gay friends who wake up after sleeping together and try to make sense of the unclear line between friendship and love.
cast: Dylan Wayne Lawrence, Daniel Lipshutz, Enzo Nova, Colin Van Wye

title: Aya
des: Two strangers unexpectedly meet at an airport. He mistakenly assumes her to be his assigned driver. She, enchanted by the random encounter, does not hurry to prove him wrong.
cast: Sarah Adler, Ulrich Thomsen

title: The Bright Side
des: With a nation on the brink of war in December of 1941, a young theater performer who dreams of becoming a Hollywood star lets go of his past fears to try to win over the girl of his dreams.
cast: Aric Damm, Ryn Weaver, Alexander Carroll, Claire Beale

title: Falling Uphill
des: Robert asks Jenny, a girl he found on Craigslist, to be his new roommate. Now after a year of living together, he finds himself falling in love with her, but his ability to keep afloat in San Francisco is coming to an end. With a lame job and not enough income, he has no choice but to move back with his parents in Rochester, NY. With only three days until his flight home, Robert struggles to tell Jenny his true feelings and to determine what direction his life is headed.
cast: Ari Kanamori, Jack McGee, Jena Hunt, Jessiqa Pace

title: Gödel Incomplete
des: A time-travel romance between one of the great minds of the 20th Century, Kurt Godel, and a lonely particle physicist, Serita Cedric, a research student working at the Large Hadron Collider in Switzerland.
cast: Elizabeth Debicki, Arthur Dignam, Christian Manon, Matt Zeremes

title: Mumbai Love
des: For a young, Indian-Filipino named Nandi and a beautiful, free-spirited Filipina named Ella, love is not to be arranged but to be found through the intercession of fate.
cast: Solenn Heussaff, Kiko Matos, Martin Escudero, Raymond Bagatsing

title: Adulthood
des: A group of friends reaching the end of the years during which mistakes can be explained by youth are forced by events outside of their control to realize that adulthood means taking responsibility for themselves, their own happiness, their own lives.
cast: Sara Fletcher, Alex Petrovitch, Katherine Randolph, John F. Beach

title: The Divorce Party
des: Conflicts arise when a young offbeat couple throw a party to celebrate their divorce.
cast: Corey Browne, Sheldon Coolman, Marikah Cunningham, Paul Thomas Davis

title: Trim
des: What would you do if life was just one big dirty joke? A misguided personal trainer struggles to clean up his life after he's sued by one of his clients, knocks up two women and suffers a major heart attack. A raw, edgy, and disturbingly funny look at what life is really like in L. A.
cast: Jonathan Wade-Drahos, Ryan Bottiglieri, Bruce Dern, Michael Pataki

title: Lost Journey
des: Arriving in Toronto from Iran, 19 year old Pedram Abasi embarks on a journey shared by millions of people every year, adapting to a new language and culture. While making great progress to the delight of his aunt and uncle who have taken him in, Pedram's life drastically changes course when he meets Nima and Chirssy who introduce him to a world of all night raves, promiscuous sex, and taking Ecstasy till sunrise. Before long, Pedram's family begins to resent his irresponsible ways and regret ever taking him in. With his education in peril and his life on a downward spiral, Pedram must now regain control before all hope is lost.
cast: David Akermanis, Mehrdad Alaei, Ali Arya, Stephanie Bell

title: RSVP
des: When newly-dumped Saul is invited to his best friend's wedding, it creates an existential crisis: will he be 'attending', or 'attending +1'? And how long can he avoid his friend before being he's forced to send his RSVP?
cast: Melissa Lusk, Amelia Mathews, Calvin Leon Smith, Calvin Leon Smith

title: Waste
des: Roger lives a grim and detached life, picking up medical waste for a living, but looks forward to his evening conversations with his quirky roommate and foodie, Olive. But as the meals become increasingly strange, and push the limits of curiousity, Roger must ask himself how far he will go for love?
cast: Luke Baines, Sarah J. Bartholomew, Catrina Solis, Jaden Taylor

title: A Flat
des: A spate of unexpected events jolted Rahul as soon as he landed from U.S. Now, Rahul finds himself trapped in his own flat, completely cut off from the world. The only companion he has is a ghost, a ghost that will not let go of him.
cast: Jimmy Sheirgill, Sanjay Suri, Hazel Croney, Kaveri Jha

title: Love in the Countryside
des: Sara Cox goes back to her farming roots as she meets 8 singletons living in the countryside who are finding it difficult to meet that special someone. Could urbanites looking to escape the rat run be the answer?
cast: Sara Cox

title: Happy Birthday, Toby Simpson
des: When a thirty-something 'suit' breaks into a music festival to retrieve his stolen belongings, he ends up finding love and freedom instead.
cast: Alexander Perkins, Edyta Budnik, Zara Day, Gary Heasman

title: Dead Silence
des: A Mobster finds his girl with a lover, what happens next is just for your eyes.
cast: Kenny Beaumont, Alec Whaite

title: The Republic of Two
des: An honest look at the funny, turbulent and beautiful high-stakes game of twentysomethings cohabitation. Tim is sure he wants to be a doctor while Caroline is sure she wants to leave Los Angeles. They both know their love is real, but can that love endure a town full of possibilities and temptation?
cast: Brent Bailey, Janet Montgomery, Brandon Fobbs, Stephanie Lemelin

title: Homebound
des: A successful young man must return to his childhood small town in Texas to help his father. His father, who's ill, wants him to take over the family business, a dilapidated bar. Secretly the young man wants to burn down the bar because he blames it for the death of his own mother and the illness of his father.
cast: Enrique Castillo, Jeremiah Ocanas, Julia Vera, Fanny Veliz Grande

title: 9 Days
des: The saying goes that love means never having to say you're sorry... This is especially true when you're being held in a religious madman's basement with your neck chained to a wooden post. '9 Days' is based on a DARKly comedic reading of 'Dante's Inferno.'
cast: Maura Murphy, Chris Schleicher, David Alan Graf, Alison Sieke

title: 7 Welcome to London
des: Indian immigrant Jai finds friendship and love, upon arriving in London. However one phone call changes everything, thrusting him into a dark and dangerous situation.
cast: Asad Shan, Sabeeka Imam, Metin Ahmet, Musa Ahmet

title: Just Ate
des: Just Ate tells the story of Eve, a brilliant, young and bulimic chef. Eve spends her time closed off in her room, distracting herself from life with food, or working at the restaurant she manages with her tyrant boss, Martin. She ignores her family, despite living with them, and her only friend is her perverted co-worker, Benji. But when she meets an enigmatic homeless man at the soup kitchen she volunteers at, Eve finds herself wanting to live again. But can a girl with so many secrets ever really let anyone in?
cast: Anna Westall, Oliver Park, Ryan Spong, Ryan William Funnell

title: Mi verano con Amanda 3
des: RS and Chico bring their friend Fabio to a clinic to help with his paranoia. Along the way, they meet three beautiful young women who change the course of their lives.
cast: Danilo Beauchamp, Monica Judith Cabrera, Javier Fever, Michelle Lopez

title: Prijde letos Jezísek?
des: Charming 60-something José (Josef Abrhám) returns to Prague after 30 years living in Mexico, though he was convinced that he would never see his hometown again. He was persuaded by his ...                See full summary »
cast: Josef Abrhám, Libuse Safránková, Dolores Heredia, Aislinn Derbez

title: Jet Set
des: The romantic comedy with the element of action. Modern Hollywood couple in dilemma between the busy career and the original human needs. While get lost in the romance - robbery and the murder shaking things up to the clarity.
cast: Danny Arroyo, Lee Benton, Mandy Brown, Pasquale Cassalia

title: American Yogi
des: When an ex- hippy turned businessman hears about a miracle making saint, he goes to India to find him to keep from living an empty life. A world music sound track by Grammy nominee Jai Uttal, exclusive interviews with Ram Dass and Krishna Das, rare footage of Neem Karoli Baba and a new perspective on Eastern philosophy make this film unique.
cast: Neem Karoli Baba, Ram Dass

title: Pappu Can't Dance Saala
des: One time bickering neighbors are forced to share the same apartment.
cast: Vinay Pathak, Neha Dhupia, Rajat Kapoor, Brijendra Kala

title: 1 Last Chance at Paradise
des: Love and memories shared by two young guys soon after the world's end.
cast: Wade Radford, Connor Paganini, Honey Bane

title: Our Infinity
des: After falling in love at a Las Vegas resort, two people find themselves alone in the universe.
cast: Ero, Stephanie Moore

title: Project Green Gables
des: Add a Plot
cast: Laura Eklund Nhaga, Jutta Majava, Juho Keskitalo, Viviana Irving

title: Once Upon a Prince
des: Violet works as a princess but her life is no fairy tale. Stuck in a dead end relationship with her not so charming boyfriend, Violet must change her situation in order to find her prince. When sparks fly between Violet and, single dad, Nathan at his daughter's birthday party, they both must decide whether to take the leap of faith or risk not finding their happily ever after.
cast: Andrew Aguilar, Marco Aguilar, Andrea Anderson, Angeline Anderson

title: Squared
des: A one night stand gets competitive when two guys find out they are both tops.
cast: Yamil Jaiman, Ethan Le Phong, Kevin Tan

title: Love Me Till Monday
des: A young woman who has recently finished university is working a dead-end office job whilst looking for 'the one'. Why can't she find the man of her dreams?
cast: Sarah Barratt, Sarah Jayne Butler, Charlotte Gallagher, Tyler Gayle

title: The Angel Inn
des: Three life long friends, torn apart by tragedy, are brought back together through a journey of romance and forgiveness when they co-inherit a pub.
cast: Daniel Kelly, Carla Albi, Matthew Gonzales, Bruce Edwards

title: Gary Numan: Android in La La Land
des: At the end of the 1970s, Gary Numan found himself to be one of the world's biggest-selling recording artists, "Are 'Friends' Electric?" and "Cars" were huge hits, no one had heard, or seen, anyone like Gary Numan. The Asperger's syndrome that helped forge Numan's tunnel-like ambition, informing his music and image, also brought problems. At a time when the public knew little about the condition, the press labeled him a freak, one paper suggested his parents should have been doctored for giving birth to him. Depression, anxiety, near bankruptcy and a long period in the wilderness followed. Then Numan fell in love with his biggest fan, Gemma, who helped him rediscover his passion for music.
cast: Gary Numan

title: Anne & Jake
des: Jake is working on creating Time Travel in his Los Angeles home in 2014 and somehow (he's not sure how exactly) causes a young woman Anne to appear, all the way from 1814, London.
cast: Victoria Bullock, Matt Dallas, Lindsay Seim, Tiffany Ariany

title: How to Be Happy
des: Following a bad breakup, relationship councilor Cormac Kavanagh starts sleeping with his clients in a misguided attempt to reignite their passions.
cast: Brian Gleeson, Gemma-Leah Devereux, Stephen Mullan, Brian Fortune
director: Michael Rob Costine, Mark Gaster, Brian O'Neill

title: The Virgins
des: A comedy about a young Christian couple who have a wild adventure on their wedding night, as one surprise after another foils their attempts to consummate the marriage.
cast: Jasmin Savoy Brown, Sonya Davis, Phillip Keiman, Conner Marx

title: Where the Road Runs Out
des: George, a scientist living in Rotterdam is growing wary of the world of academia. The sudden death of an old friend is the incentive he needs to return to his African roots where he takes over a dilapidated field station in the jungle of Equatorial Guinea. There he meets an orphan boy with a sunny disposition who opens George's wary eyes to this colorful place. The boy plays matchmaker between George and the lady who runs the local orphanage and all seems rosy until an old friend of George's shows up out of nowhere to throw their lives into disarray as George discovers there are many obstacles on the road to redemption and a few more where the road runs out.
cast: Isaach De Bankolé, Juliet Landau, Stelio Savante, Sizo Motsoko

title: Bruno & Earlene Go to Vegas
des: Earlene arrives at Venice Beach after running away from an estranged lover, only to become fast friends with an Australian skater who is also lost. Together, they set out into the desert to find themselves.
cast: Cassandra Peterson, Sheena Metal, Ashleigh Sumner, Simon Savory

title: It Gets Better
des: "It Gets Better" is a gay love story between Adam, a closeted jock, and Pierre, an openly gay boy, that revolves around peer pressure, bullying and acceptance.
cast: Jason Berrent, Brett Girard, Stefano Meier, Guilherme Scarabelot

title: Chocolate Cake
des: A first date brings young Jenny and Tim together for a slice of chocolate cake. As their connection grows, just like with each layer of cake, they develop a deeper and richer connection. As they share the cake and more about each other, love reveals a potential path for the two of them, as well as an inevitable roller coaster of emotions. The only question left is, will they take a chance on love?
cast: Pitto Acosta, Jasmine Barcia, Brittney Grabill, Robert Herrick

title: My Accomplice
des: My Accomplice is an off-beat comedy about falling in love, set in Brighton, featuring songs and live performances from local bands Transformer, Bob Wants His Head Back and The Mountain Firework Company, an ill-starred search for the village of Wivelsfield, the personal politics of perestroika in the wider context of David Hassel-hoff, apricot flapjacks, abruptly unpredictable weather, gathering evidence of a seagull conspiracy, and a small cast of everyday eccentrics that usually don't make it into films: Bulgarians, adults with learning disabilities, very tall women and elective mutes. In a city of this many vulnerable adults, Frank and Ilse might never have met.
cast: Dimitrina Elliott, John Fitzmaurice, Alan Gilchrist, Martyn Holmes

title: Jake and Jasper: A Ferret Tale
des: A young boy struggling with the death of his mother finds solace with a ferret named Jasper.
cast: Connor Stanhope, Falcor the Ferret, Andrew Jackson, Nina Hagerty

title: Santa
des: A trip to Lapland leads to immense changes in the life of a single mother and her seven- year- old son. Love, hope and efforts to save the life of the little boy will change dramatically the lives of the two grown-ups.
cast: Tommi Korpela, Sandra Dauksaite-Petrulene, Ovidijus Petravicius, Helka Periaho

title: Creation
des: A man wakes up in a white empty room with only a laptop at his side. Whatever he writes on it becomes true.
cast: Sian Altman, Benjamin Coulter

title: Monggollian peulinseseu
des: One day, you fell from the sky. I never knew loving somebody could bring so much happiness. I see the world differently because of you. I am a different person because you live in my heart.
cast: Danwoo Jung, Elisabeth Garcia, Ha Na Park, Seok-cheon Hong

title: The Other Side of the Mountain
des: A North Korean nurse and a South Korean soldier fall in love during a tumultuous time of the Korean War, and experience lifetimes of consequences, separation and pain, with the hope of reuniting one day.
cast: Hyang Suk Kim, Ryung Min Kim, Jung Taik Park

title: Cheat Day
des: A boy gets a surprise when he finds out that his girlfriend has a date with a celebrity from her pre-approved cheat list.
cast: Zena Grey, Morgan Krantz, Mike Catherwood, Rip Taylor

title: Partners
des: When a slump in work/life Partners Kate and Leigh's sex life forces them to reconsider their relationship, they must confront how intertwined their lives have become, to humorous ends.
cast: Ty A. Smith, Jen Tullock, Hannah Pearl Utt

title: 30-LOVE
des: When his wife dies during childbirth, a man takes up her favorite sport, tennis, in an effort to hold onto her memory. He focuses on winning tournaments and neglects his newborn daughter. A family tug-of-war begins for control of his baby.
cast: Robert Cannon, Brenda Vaccaro, Justin Lee, Mark Gagliardi

title: Like Crazy: Alternate Scenes
des: Add a Plot
cast: Amanda Carlin, Felicity Jones, Alex Kingston, Jennifer Lawrence

title: Pride & Prejudice & Zombies
des: Elizabeth Bennet battles fierce zombies, while trying to win the heart of the arrogant Mr. Darcy.
cast: Taryn Hoffman, Stephen Fritz, Devin Hoffman, Aleya Richards

title: One Thousand Cranes
des: A dark, sweet film about Dorian, a romantic young runaway who makes art out of everything she sees. She watches the world from a Brooklyn rooftop and folds one thousand paper cranes to get her wish, the love of graffiti artist Lorenzo.
cast: Julia Garner, Darren Eugene Mallett, Sarita Covington, Henry Packer

title: The Good Son
des: Add a Plot
cast: Joshua Garcia, Jerome Ponce, Nash Aguas, McCoy De Leon

title: The Fourth Noble Truth
des: Movie star Aaron, busted for road rage assault, is sent by his lawyer to a meditation teacher, Rachel, for help. He undermines their sessions with seductive behavior. Falling for his charm, she has to stop seeing him. He's arrested again. When he's free he tries to convince her he's changed.
cast: Harry Hamlin, Kristen Kerr, Tom Ohmer, Richard Portnow

title: A Stone Appears
des: A man and a woman live in an infinite routine loop, until a Stone appears.
cast: Bill Skarsgård, Emma Doxiadi

title: LANCO: Greatest Love Story
des: In the music video for LANco's "Greatest Love Story", a boy and a girl grow up together in the 1980s, before she leaves their small town for college.
cast: Lanco

title: Ondraa Irandaa Aasaigal
des: Its a thriller constrained to time, revolving among a bunch of eccentric characters nudging through betrayal, love, and friendship.
cast: Luma Beaty, Anil Gandhi, Ashwin Jerome, Shali Nivekas

title: Cadaver
des: A cadaver wakes up to say a last goodbye to his wife, but discovers a truth in death that he didn't know in life.
cast: Christopher Lloyd, Tavi Gevinson, Kathy Bates, Ashley Hale Spellman

title: Time of the Month
des: A man's outlook on a woman's time of the month and how to deal with her during that time.
cast: Chris Stokes

title: Doggo
des: Minky is a woman who dreams of escaping her overbearing relationship to be with another man. She stars on her own cooking show and is terrible at her job. At her lowest moment, Johnny Doggo swoops in and saves her from disaster.
cast: Danielle Laughlin, Mark Troy, Joel D. Wynkoop

title: Art Ache
des: Alex despises Modern Art but when he falls in love with an adorable French artist, he understands that the only way to conquer her heart is to pretend he is an artist. He now must win a Modern Art contest in order to win her heart.
cast: David Wayman, Sharlit Deyzac, Dee Tails, Adrian Bouchet

title: To the Moon
des: A coming to age adventure of 17 year old Gia Rose that is faced with a decision to make about who she is trying be versus who she really is.
cast: Lucas Bin, Alexa Demie, Kasey Elise, August Reed

title: Phhir
des: With the help of the police and a psychic, a husband attempts to try and locate his missing wife.
cast: Rajniesh Duggall, Roshni Chopra, Monica, Adah Sharma

title: Rising Star
des: An overworked insurance adjuster must decide between his job and his passion after he accidentally meets his online love interest.
cast: Gary Ploski, Emily Morse, Michael Barra, Sari Gagnon

title: P + V
des: Penny decides she's finally ready to have sex with her boyfriend. Only problem: he thinks she already has. She enlists the help of her best friend Vince to take her virginity so she can be prepared for when it really matters.
cast: Maddie McGuire, Sasha Feldman, Andrew Pifko, Melody Peng

title: Jimami Tofu
des: A Chinese Singaporean chef, formerly working in Tokyo, finds himself in Okinawa begging a disgruntled old chef to teach him traditional Okinawan food. A top Japanese food critic finds herself in Singapore on an eye opening discovery of Southeast Asian cuisine. In reality both are looking for each other after an emotional breakup years ago. Emotionally crippled by their breakup he searches her home-town for her but discovers instead the art of traditional Okinawan food. Through it he learns the incredible balance of two cultures: Chinese and Japanese - a balance they never had in their relationship. When she suddenly appears in Okinawa looking to find closure he cooks and serves her their final meal. Through it she discovers what she had been yearning for all these years.
cast: Jason Chan, Mari Yamamoto, Masane Tsukayama, Rino Nakasone

title: The Boundary
des: Doubts about reality lead to one man's journey to the edge of the universe.
cast: Colton Tapp, Crystal Cook, Matthew Roy, Lesley Pedersen

title: Good Morning
des: A short film that comically examines ideas of sexual identity and age anxiety via the story of a man who-on the morning after his 30th birthday party-wakes up with both a massive hangover and a 17-year-old boy sleeping on his couch.
cast: Peter Knegt, Oliver Skinner

title: Laura Gets a Cat
des: Laura, an unemployed writer in New York City, tries to juggle an unexciting boyfriend, an affair with a performance artist, and a vivid imaginary life.
cast: Dana Brooke, Michael Ferrell, Josh Tyson, Brian Mullins

title: Grand Theft Love
des: After everything was taken from him, Nick Ortega decides to take from others and become a thief. In a race against time, he will meet one more time the woman who started all his problems, the one that ignites his heart.
cast: Gerrard Lobo, Lexi Zettle

title: Last Word
des: Filled with twists and betrayal, 'Last Word' is a confronting final conversation between a lesbian couple, guiding us through the history of their relationship in reverse in order to understand where they have arrived in the present.
cast: Arielle Tayar, Casey Jayne, Lauren Storm, Amy Barriga

title: Disco
des: July 1997. The height of summer. England. Oasis reach number one with 'D'you Know What I Mean'. Tony Blair has moved his stuff in to Downing Street. Meanwhile Danny is trying to tell a girl named Pippa that he likes her. On this Friday we follow Danny through miscommunication, gossip, Chinese whispers and a love triangle between Danny, Pippa and his best friend Greg.
cast: Bill Milner, Izzy Meikle-Small, Charlie Rowe, Lil Woods

title: Lama
des: Lama, based on a true story is about a woman, a blond beauty, who is seen by her students as a spiritual master. She relates an episode to her devoted followers involving the cleansing of her husband's distress. She explains that he is deeply admiring and loving but tortured. The story then flashes back to the night when she channels Kali, the dark goddess of empowerment and tries to cure her surprised but pliant lover through passionate knife wounds to his torso. He is healed! Upon hearing this, a shocked community orders them to leave. The couple is devastated but then resigned. They go but on their own terms. United in love they walk out the door into the unknown.
cast: Natalie Thomas, Dan Cozzens

title: Mr & Mrs
des: A marriage that started on love and trust suddenly nose dived into the ditch of wealth and opulence and the marriage went sour. An African woman's struggle to retain and sustain her marriage knows no bound.
cast: Paul Apel, Joseph Benjamin, Beauty Benson, Babajide Bolarinwa

title: Committed
des: The ever devoted boyfriend adds another to his collection.
cast: Ian Campbell, Kareena Clark, Marie Cobalt

title: Plans
des: Zia, a young medical student moves to inner-city Sydney and is embraced by an eclectic group of misfits - all of whom deal with the unexpected turns of life in uniquely flawed ways as they navigate their way through a drama-filled week.
cast: Taylor Beadle-Williams, Johnny Emery, Peter-William Jamieson, Tashi Martel

title: Black Card
des: In a culture requiring an ID card and commitment to the code, an African-American couple is about to find out just how far the boundaries can be pushed...
cast: Stephen Hill, Malikha Mallette, Michael Markham, April Matthis

title: LOVE, 100°C
des: A hearing-impaired boy, Min-so is gay, and he likes his classmate, Ji-seok. One day, Min-so impulsively has sex with a young man who works in a public bath, an experience that lends him new confidence, but at a heavy price.

A tale of procrastination, making movies and growing up, Love & Taxes is a middle-aged coming-of-age story that is also, quite possibly, the first ever pro-tax romantic comedy.

title: Molly's Girl
des: An emotional misfit named Molly believes she's found love in a drunken one-night stand with a gay-marriage lesbian activist named Mercedes. But once sober, Mercedes discovers she cannot escape the clingy and desperate Molly. As she's about to call upon all of her legal options to rid herself of Molly, Mercedes learns that Molly's father is actually an influential state senator opposed to gay marriage. Seeing this as a golden opportunity, Mercedes convinces Molly to pretend that they are an engaged lesbian couple, though Molly's not at all gay, as a way to drive a stake into the senator's politics. But as Mercedes gets to know Molly's family, she begins to understand who Molly is and why they surprisingly share so much in common.

des: 'Buttercup Bill' is the psychosexual romance of Patrick and Pernilla -- mutually obsessed soul-mates clinging to childhood secrets. des: "Notes From The New World" is a contemporary retelling of Dostoyevsky's novella which unfolds in Los Angeles where dreams and harsh realities collide. It is a place where almost everyone spies on everyone else, and everyone seems to be playing a dangerous game. Steven is torn between the loves of two women, each of them pretending to be somebody else. The danger only intensifies when Steven comes face to face with the Russian Mafia. Soon he will discover who he really is. On another level the story suggests an amazing reading of the state of the post modern/post communist world. Are we witnessing certain realization of Dostoyevsky's prophecies - especially as far as the Underground Man's dilemma regarding Love/Terrorism is concerned?..
cast: Rebecca Light, Natasha Blasick, Nathanael Theisen, Jerry Prager

Rotting Hill is the collision of two film genres to make a zombie-romcom. It's a love story, with a bit of a twist.

Nadine has also come back to Derry after many years away, she is the estranged daughter of the resident crime boss Simon McKnight and also George first love. When Emmet finds a bag of money belonging to a ruthless loyalist hit-man Giggles, George is compelled to help him one last time to return it. With a little help from Riun and Sinead, who won't let her go without a fight, and the manifestation of a pop star alter ego named Fierce, Dolore struggles to combat her paranoia and anxiety before they consume her and the people she loves.

The only problem is that she lives in Serbia, and he is not allowed to enter. In the middle of the craziness that reigns at the border, he will do everything he can to get across. cast: Jaime Gallagher, Manny Rey, Richard Moll, Robert H. Lambert

title: Stomping Grounds
des: Portrayed by Bill Milner (iBOY, X-Men First Class, Dunkirk, Apostle, Son Of Rambow) Monroe is a gifted dancer obsessed with being the best he can be. While saying goodbye to his family home, he recalls various fragmented memories in one long, tap dancing-filled dream sequence. In the present day, a more mature and level headed Monroe is our vessel. Through the corridors of an increasingly temperamental, almost living-breathing house, we witness his downfall and see how his relationships were fractured almost beyond repair. The film poses to ask the age old question of 'what went wrong?' and answer it in a vibrant, experimental way. Whiplash meets Billy Elliot.
cast: Amelia Clarkson, Katharine Jee, Bill Milner, Vincent Woods

title: Holy Whores and Heretics the Secret Life of Mary Magdalene
des: Pagan priestesses unveil a web of intrigue, betrayal and redemption in this Apocryphal psychedelic-rock re-telling of The Passion.
cast: David Castro, Tara Alexandra Brown, David A. Lockhart, Ewart Chin

title: Masc Only
des: Gay best friends, Tommy and Wesley, unwittingly venture to an intimidating party hosted by the gay elite. Basically it's just 'Mean Girls' except everyone is gay and 40.
cast: Tristan Josef, Kate Gauthier, Matthew Wilkas, Michael Cavadias

title: Tinder
des: Tinder The Web Series - the web series based upon real life dates and events on the popular dating application Tinder. Kate a likeable, young girl gets pressured into joining Tinder by her roommate Michelle. Follow her throughout each episode and partake on Kate's crazy, hilarious, frighteningly enjoyable experience on the dating site. Remember - a right swipe is not always the right swipe.
cast: Laaren Bensette, Adam Bonney, Nathan Bragg, Brittany Clough

title: NY84
des: NY84 follows the adventures of three young artists in the downtown art scene in the early 1980's. We gain an intimate glimpse into the creative and emotional life of Kate, Anton, and Keith. Young and carefree, the friends party, photograph, paint, sing, and play their way through the clubs and lofts of Alphabet City. The party ends in 1984 when Anton and Keith contract a mysterious illness known as the "gay cancer." As her music career takes off, Kate tries to save her friends. With the cameras still rolling, we meet the parents, patrons, and patients that struggle against the epidemic.
cast: Sam Quartin, Chris Schellenger, Davy J. Marr, Ray Field

title: Obce cialo
des: Angelo and Kasia met in Italy in the Focolare Movement where their love and faith in God brought them together. Their relationship's in broken by the girl's return to Poland and her decision on entering the convent. Angelo arrives in Warsaw in order to persuade Kasia to change her mind. He takes up a job in an international corporation while waiting for her decision...
cast: Riccardo Leonelli, Agnieszka Grochowska, Agata Buzek, Weronika Rosati

title: Durban Poison
des: Based on the 1980's real life crime story of the couple who became known as South Africa's Bonnie and Clyde, Charmaine Phillips and Pieter Grundlingh, Durban Poison tells the fictionalized story via a road trip during the police investigation, where the killing couple show the police the different murder locations of the four men they killed. The savvy police officer in charge does not believe their accounts of what took place and, through flash-backs that slowly peel away the masks to reveal the passions and wounds of Joline and Pieter, the truth finally comes out in a dramatic final beach scene.
cast: Brandon Auret, Cara Roberts, Gys de Villiers, Marcel van Heerden

title: Water in a Broken Glass
des: Tonya Mimms is a successful artist who feels firmly footed in her rise to fame until her ascent is challenged in the most unexpected ways. While meandering through the throes of a love triangle, with a charismatic man and a stunningly beautiful woman. Tonya takes on an assignment that pushes her completely out of her element. Now, in the midst of total chaos, Tonya is forced to come to terms with herself, as an artist and a woman.
cast: Victoria Rowell, Carlyncia S. Peck, Candiace Dillard, Toni Belafonte

title: Satellite of Love
des: The story of a composer on a quest to understand the unrequited love he shares with his best friend's wife.
cast: Nathan Phillips, Zachary Knighton, Shannon Lucio, Janina Gavankar

title: Anita Ho
des: A Korean American man meets his Chinese American girlfriend's parents for the first time. Drama, cultural struggles, and laughter ensue.
cast: George Cheung, Elizabeth Sung, Lina So, Steve Myung

title: Me You and Five Bucks
des: A womanizing yet lovable loser, Charlie, a waiter in his early 30's who dreams of selling his book entitled "7 STEPS OF HEALING THE MALE BROKEN HEART" finds himself still working in restaurants to survive in the Big Apple. Low on cash, he's left with no other choice but to look for a roommate to share his tiny studio. Surprisingly, the first person to answer the ad is his ex and only love of his life Pam, who broke his heart and disappeared without reason and the inspiration behind his book. The Pam he remembered was a youthful spirit with lots of money who is now broke and disheveled. A new story begins and it is up to Charlie to find out why she ran out on him and what's happened to her over the past three years. With a potential new love in his life, he must gather the strength to help Pam get back on her feet without rekindling old feelings.
cast: Angela Sarafyan, Jaime Zevallos, Sean Nateghi, Daniel C.

title: My Valentine Girls
des: A novelist is searching for a girlfriend as he writes his next book, a trilogy of love stories (Soulmates, BFF, and Gunaw). His little sister and pseudo cupid adds cuteness and light banter. Philippines Filipino movie.
cast: Richard Gutierrez, Jillian Ward, Rhian Ramos, Princess Punzalan
director: Chris Martinez, Andoy Ranay, Dominic Zapata

title: Sharkskin
des: Italian tailor Mike Esposito makes suits for mafia Don Piano and falls into a moral dilemma.
cast: John Aprea, David Proval, Robert Costanzo, Don Calfa

title: The Argonaut
des: Allie wakes up, after taking her own life, in a room filled with memories in the form of photographs, negatives and slides that cover the floors and walls. Unable to move onto the other world, she slowly realizes that she can relive each memory. Allie comes to understand that the memories are picked by the room she now inhabits, forcing her to deal with problems she was originally running from.
cast: Michelle Mueller, Paul D. Morgan

title: Can't Help Falling in Love
des: Gabriel and Jess Conte portray their love for each other in this music video for "Can't Help Falling in Love."
cast: Gabriel Conte, Jess Conte

title: Manalive
des: In a house of disenchanted, disconnected renters, a new tenant stirs life in all of them... but is he who he seems?
cast: Kaiser Johnson, Mark P. Shea, Andrew Weir, Ashley Ahlquist

title: Zodiac Sign
des: Add a Plot
cast: Caryn Ward, Tammy Townsend, Tanjareen Thomas, Carl Anthony Payne II

title: Love Is Blind
des: A fresh take on the classic a love triangle.
cast: Sophie Allen, Will Best, Ace Mahbaz, Joseph Baker

title: Boston2Philly
des: Boston2Philly is a coming-of-age drama following the life of a young Black male from Boston struggling with his identity and his ability to form real relationships after a tragic accident takes the lives of his family.
cast: Shelby Poston, Mike Sutton, Jahmar Hill, Natalia Jablokov

title: Spanko
des: When a misfit teacher explores her taboo fantasies, she's inspired to start a revolution of self-acceptance.
cast: Viravara Shetty, Adam Amiri, Janis Amiri, Joseph Aranda Jr.

title: I Love You to Death
des: Clay Foster is face to face with a griping situation. His wife is dead and he cannot accept it. He is in denial. The story starts in the midst of a tangled murder mystery. Clay's wife was brutally murdered. How was she killed? Who killed her? The audience is forced to see the world as Clay does, through the eyes of a man traveling through the horrible stages of grieving; denial, anger, and finally acceptance, trying to solve the mystery of his murdered wife. As death comes upon all men, so does the Syphon. In clays diminutive state, his sanity brings him to rest very close at the veil between life and death. He is attune to the fragments and properties that join the two worlds, and being in such a state he is privy to witness and communicate with the beings that walk between them.
cast: Travis Mendenhall, Shannon O'Dowd, John Klemantaski, Christopher Ivins

title: Rosario
des: The film tells the saga of Rosario, a young and liberated woman in the 1920s who has just arrived from New York, and is spending her vacation in their hacienda.There, she meets and falls in...                See full synopsis »
cast: Dolphy, Phillip Salvador, Jennylyn Mercado, Yul Servo

title: Gaykeith
des: Meet Scott: a 260 pound red-headed,fun-lovin', bi-polar, hockey-playin' sexual deviant who recently turned forty and who has spent the last 15 years living in Los Angeles, out of work and overweight. No job, no girlfriend, a lot of cereal and too much internet porn. On a particularly lonely Christmas Eve, Scott decides the answer to all his problems may lie in North Hollywood-his name is Keith and he's willing to wear pantyhose if Scott comes over.
cast: Scott Edgecombe, Ho-Kwan Tse

title: Semblance
des: Ray, a respected surgeon, must face an ethical battle to end the life of the clone he has raised in order to save the original child's life.
cast: Dwight Turner, Juliette Allison Bailey, Marshall Foster, Joey Rich

title: Bittersweet Monday
des: An emotional goodbye between longtime best friends begins an unexpected love affair, putting two marriages and many friendships at stake.
cast: Philipp Christopher, David Covington, Jaime Lee, Lauren LoGiudice

title: Juliet & Romeo
des: The greatest love story of all time, retold with a lesbian twist.
cast: Tucky Williams, Emily Fleischer

title: Love Out of Mind
des: A young man with bipolar disorder struggles to enter into a relationship, but is afraid of getting hurt.
cast: Camilla Crawford, Aaron Fisher, Rebekah Madebach, Claudine Quadrat

title: Mind Over Mindy
des: A middle-aged man's troubled relationship with his fiancée becomes even more complex when his teen-age ex-girlfriend from 1989 literally materializes from out of his dreams and into the 21st century.
cast: Steve Parks, Catherine McCafferty, Ann Hagemann, Larry Thomas

title: Zoe.Misplaced
des: Zoe's regimented life is thrown into upheaval when she unexpectedly falls in love. In doing so, she is faced with making a series of choices whose outcomes not only impact on her independence but on the relationships with those most important to her.
cast: Hannah Raven Smith, Clementine Mills, Harvey Zielinski, Ryan Bennett

title: Lian ai zhong de cheng shi
des: Florence, Prague, Paris, Shanghai, Otaru of Hokkaido, five different love stories in five different cities.

title: Red Flag

A tragicomedy about death and marriage, RED FLAG unfurls across six sates, four broken souls, and one very elusive bird.
cast: Dustin Guy Defa, Alex Karpovsky, Keith Poulson, Jennifer Prediger

title: The Royals
des: The lives of Rakhil, Jonathon and their family.
cast: Ariel Tepes Sharkey, Hekate-Margaret Tepes Sharkey, Jonathon The Impaler Sharkey, Rakhil Dolgorukov Tepes Sharkey

title: Skin in the Game
des: Sarah was just the 'girl next door', but online, she was Raven Riley, rising star of interactive porn. With a savvy business manager, a pioneering promoter, and her devoted boyfriend by her side, Sarah stepped onto a roller coaster of fame and fortune, unaware her that world was about to derail.
cast: David Pilot

title: Der Koch
des: Add a Plot
cast: Hamza Jeetooa, Jessica Schwarz, Hanspeter Müller, Yrsa Daley-Ward

title: Toronah
des: Instead of enjoying the lucrative sale of his company, a local businessman has to deal with old faces from his past looking for handouts. With little time to spare, he has to juggle the insanity all while trying to help his down-and-out cousin from Chicago.
cast: Adam Ansell, Ashley Awde, Gino Caramia, Wendy Crystal

title: Just Dance
des: A dancer obsessed with her own perfection faced with a clumsy audio boy who teaches her to go with the flow.
cast: Meagan Stevenson, Ben Huntley

title: Rise of the Underdog
des: Rise of the Underdog follows the true story of a young nurse, Will McIntyre, who has his freedom taken after a one night stand leads to a false allegation of rape. Found guilty upon trial Will is sent to maximum security prison where he meets Jimmy, a hardened inmate, infamous for a string of armed robberies. Jimmy is positively impacted by Will's courage and struggle to survive. Meanwhile, a QC Barrister, Julie Nile, is challenged to compromise status and salary to prove his innocence.
cast: Tade Adepoyibi, Susan Ador, Hardy Awadjie, Emma Baldwin

title: Ctrl+Alt+Dance
des: Ctrl+Alt+Dance is about Colin, a risk-averse computer tech, who falls for happy-go-lucky jazz dancer Jillian but is in danger of losing it all when a disgruntled hacker threatens to expose a hidden secret.
cast: Sarah Breck, Anthony Campanello, Jeffrey Day, Brady Faust

title: Saffron Burrows
des: Self fulfilling prophesy of actress Anna Faris as she spends her last days in idyllic Seattle with her laid-back boyfriend before she heads to Los Angeles and becomes a star.
cast: Alec Whittle

title: A Good Day to Die, Hoka Hey
des: This is the story of a man's bravery to cover the world at war, and what it takes to get images published for the world to see. This is Jason P. Howe's story of survival and change.
cast: Roger Arnold, Connie Booth, Seamus Conlan, David Eades

title: Sabbatical
des: Sabbatical (n). 'A break or change from a normal routine.' but what if the normal routine is a healthy and loving relationship? In 'Sabbatical,' Phillip and Sam grapple with the concept of taking time apart from one another, and dealing with the consequences of coming back together after a mutually agreed-upon separation. Can a relationship, no matter how strong, survive that kind of independence? And does being apart strengthen bonds, or is it inevitably the first step in saying goodbye?
cast: Shane Alexander, Judith Benezra, Michael Carbonaro, Ross Marquand

title: $tripped
des: Two childhood friends, Milo, a gay man, and Lainey, a straight woman, reunite as adults. They become entangled in a sexual web with a bisexual Lothario that causes the two friends to confront their growing romantic feelings for each other.
cast: Darlene Dalmaceda, Alex Kersting, Addyson Medley, Carl Windom Carlito

title: Let's Not Talk About Syria
des: A madly-in-love couple negotiates the terms of opening up.
cast: Lucie Guest, Jonah Bay

title: Beta
des: A troubled rock star is sentenced to house arrest and given the opportunity to participate in the beta testing of the world's first fully immersive 3D video game. While doing so he meets a girl who makes him question what it means to be human, and he gets his answer.
cast: Evan Gamble, Layton Matthews, Cole Smith, Jesse C. Boyd

title: Only the Young
des: A documentary on three teenagers living in a small desert town in Southern California.
cast: Garrison Saenz, Kevin Conway, Skye Elmore, Samantha MacDonald

title: Shut Up and Drive
des: An unlikely love triangle forms when Jane and Laura drive to New Orleans to visit the only thing they thought they had in common -- a boy.
cast: Zoë Worth, Sarah Sutherland, Morgan Krantz, James Duval

title: A Love Story
des: A love story is a whimsical short animated film.
cast: Adam Bramble

title: Julia Blue
des: A student activist in Ukraine finds herself falling for a soldier.
cast: Dariya Barihashvili, Dmytro Iaroshenko, Victoriia Kopot, Bogdan Revkevich

title: Manhattan
des: Unlucky in love and publishing, Miles Adler escapes the big city in search of a fresh start back home in the Midwest. What he finds in the vibrant small town of Manhattan, however, is far more than just the inspiration for his new novel.
cast: Ryan Bruce, Lisa Erbe, Rachael Fox, Tyler Lansdown

title: Falling
des: ASLAN has 24 hours to change the memories his ex, ALMA, has of their life together.
cast: Birol Ünel, Emma Suárez, Gabriel Tineo, Celines Toribio

title: Bookmark
des: Add a Plot
cast: Nandha Kishore, Sandhya Shivakumar

title: 25 & Counting
des: Two cousins have both turned 25-years-old and are experiencing a Quarter-Life crisis.
cast: Katie Schwartz, Rosie Darch, Will Brittain, Nick Greene

title: The Station Master
des: The short film is set in 1950s England, about a lonely, dysfunctional Station Master who lives in the middle of nowhere. Unexpectedly a woman exits one of the steam trains and during the night they spend together, she opens his eyes to a life he never believed he could have.
cast: Shane Attwooll, Nadia Cameron-Blakey, Christopher Hall, Benjamin Noble

title: Tea for Two
des: Jim and Alice are serving behind the counter of an idyllic but quiet British village tea shop. When some customers finally arrive, they soon discover it's more than a pot of tea and a slice of cake being dished up by their hosts.
cast: John Challis, Amanda Barrie, Billy Postlethwaite, Abigail Parmenter

title: Checking In
des: In any Hotel, there are stories. Each guest there has one, a past, a conflict, as well as hope. Set in a hotel over the course of 24 hours, 'Checking In', tells five stories, each allowing us an insight into some of these guests. What happens when an Asian wedding goes awry? Can a one-night stand be more than just that? Will a singer regain her inspiration? And can you really get away with stealing the complimentary soap!? These are just some of the stories you will find when you 'check in'.
cast: David Claridge, Rushaun Cookhorn, Michelle Cox, Troy Dennison
director: Mark Adams, Troy Dennison, Rebecca Harris-Smith, David Hastings, Kaushy Patel, Leah Solmaz

title: Guys and Girls Can't Be Friends
des: A young man discovers love for the first time with a girl he's been friends with since grade school but struggles to avoid first-time heartbreak in small-town Virginia.
cast: Ben Solenberger, Stephen Tobolowsky, Clint Howard, Emily Davenport

title: Train Set
des: Sam looks forward to happy family life with girlfriend Jennifer and rediscovered teenage son Mark. Complications ensue when best friend Jonathan meets an early demise. Unfazed by Sam's decision to bury Jonathan in their herb patch mystic lodgers Trevor and Tracey hatch a plan to reanimate Jonathan, a fact unknown to Sam who now struggles to hold onto Jennifer and avoid encounters with the police fuelled by nosy neighbour Mrs Burd. With twists and turns at every corner this ZomCom love story gives a new meaning to the concept of survival.
cast: Patrick Bergin, Jimmy Vee, Vivien Taylor, Faye Ormston

title: Double Wide Blues
des: A documentary about the often funny, sometimes sad, but always outrageous lives of the residents of a southern trailer park.
cast: Drue Delio, Matt Lowe, Chuck Ashworth, William Mark McCullough

title: Ban shou shao nu
des: Three directors, three group of students, three stories, all aiming at the upcoming National Students' Talent Competition, where all the students training hard to perform on stage to win the game.
cast: J.C. Chee, Daphne Chuah, Emily Kong, Hsuan-Chi Kuo

title: When Harry Met Meghan: A Royal Romance
des: A profile of the American actress who has won the heart of Prince Harry. Royal experts provide an insight into the couple's romance and friends and colleagues discuss Meghan's childhood in Los Angeles.
cast: Diveen Henry, Marc Bernardin, Robert Jobson, Katie Nicholl
director: Edmond Buckley, Lisa Martinson, Richard Sanders

title: Could This Be Love
des: Sandra, a small town country girl, returns home after college to take over the family business, her father's beloved bed and breakfast. Facing an unfaithful husband and dysfunctional relationship with her mother, she finds herself at a difficult crossroads. Everything changes, however, when Terrance (Steven Sutton), a young, handsome lawyer checks in and opens her eyes to an entirely different life filled with happiness.
cast: Drew Sidora, Steven Sutton, Queen D'Viel, Thomas Mikal Ford

title: Pure Love
des: Pure Love is a story about love, revenge and moving on. A few days before the wedding Eve and Abel hatch out a plan to do just that, by literally killing off four ex lovers who's past actions still impact their present lives. Each will kill one for themselves, the ex who's a constant threat to the relationship and one for the other, the ex that caused the most pain, physically, mentally or emotionally. Theirs is a Pure Love, the kind you'd kill for.
cast: Katie Louise Adams, Charlene Amoia, Ilana Cohn, Patrick Cramer

title: Irritable
des: A man with severe digestive issues develops feelings for his Dietitian.
cast: Hasnain Ali, Jessica Barrish, Stefanie Bloom, McKenna Cole

title: Nowhere to Go
des: When a relationship breaks, how do you stop playing with fire, when you're in love with the burn?
cast: Carly Chaikin, Jordan Heathcott

title: Katawa Shoujo
des: A bishoujo-style visual novel set in the fictional Yamaku High School for disabled children, located somewhere in modern Japan. Hisao Nakai, a normal boy living a normal life, has his life turned upside down when a congenital heart defect forces him to move to a new school after a long hospitalization. Despite his difficulties, Hisao is able to find friends-and perhaps love, if he plays his cards right. There are five main paths corresponding to the 5 main female characters, each path following the storyline pertaining to that character.

title: Clown Service
des: A heartbroken woman, desperate for a brighter mood, enlists the services of a traveling party clown.
cast: Stephanie Allynne, Nathan Barnatt, David Harris, Guillermo Herrera

title: Dear Friend
des: Follows the story of seventeen-year-old Christian, who in 1965 has fallen in love with his best friend, James.
cast: Joshua Miles, Julian Mack, Christopher Gee
