title: Shekinah: The Intimate Life of Hasidic Women
des: Shekinah takes us into the rarefied world of young hasidic women. Although they have rules for almost everything, their lives are filled with passion. With unprecedented access, Shekinah will capture the intimate details of every aspect of how they live and what they believe. They will tell us why 'kosher' sex is as intense and blissful as any Eastern Tantric philosophy and why they they see themselves as more liberated than most women today. Shekinah will break many long-standing stereotypes and reveal secrets of which even Hasidic men are unaware.
cast: Chanie Charlebach, Abby Jack Neidik, Yisroel Bernath

title: Goodbye Heart
des: On his last night in town, a charming but down-on-his luck rent boy finds love in an unexpected place.
cast: Nancy Clarkson, Andy Gathergood, Christopher Hatherall, Ciaran Kellgren

title: Teaching the Nightingale
des: "Teaching the Nightingale" is based on a story from In the Empire of Dreams by Dianne Highbridge. Teruko, a Japanese woman in her mid-thirties, is struggling with a secret dilemma, but she cannot tell anyone, not even Larry, an openly and happily gay Australian who she thinks of as her best friend. When she meets Larry for lunch one day in an upscale Tokyo coffee shop, she is reaching a crisis point. As Larry begins to sense that Teruko is holding something back, we see what happened to her the previous weekend when she went hiking in the mountains. The two days she spent in the mountains led Teruko to a turning point in another significant relationship and a decision to move on, but now she feels trapped and hopeless. In a moment of weakness she asks Larry to do something for her that will bring their friendship to a turning point. "Teaching the Nightingale" is a film about about secrets and lies that we tell ourselves and others, about private passions and public personas, and about the difficulty of breaking with the past.
cast: Luke Bridgford, Tomoko Hayakawa, Takeshi Uehara

title: My Guy Cary Grant
des: A blocked historical romance writer named Samantha Collins is put through a humiliating meeting with a matchmaker who seems more interested in creating a whole new Samantha than in finding her the right match.
cast: Devin Mills, John Schneider

title: Bloodshedding Love
des: A young drifter, Sammy, walks into a small town looking for peace and tranquility. That ideal, however, comes to a halt when he stumbles across a gang-beating and tries to prevent it. When the gang, the Reps, discovers that Sammy is a homosexual, their homophobic ideals drive them to also beat Sammy to near death. The beating ceases, however, when the Reps' rival gang, the Krats, comes to the rescue and takes Sammy in as one of their own, not knowing he's a homosexual. Tensions arise, when Sammy falls in love with another man who lives on the Reps' side of town. Should Sammy conceal his true identity? Should he pursue his love interest with another man who lives on the rival gang's turf?
cast: Sean Perry, Logan Anderson, Rene Saquin, Matt Sicher

title: Novella
des: Through colorful literature, we enter the creative mind of an Author who sets off to write her first Black romance novel.
cast: David Busby, Simeon Othello Daise, Marquita Goings, Nekala Rosetta

des: A (completely straight) man is hard to find. 80/20 follows Jesse on a journey of self-discovery trying to figure out what it means to be a real man in the new century, forming new relationships, falling in love, and making connections in the most surprising places. When his tight-knit social circle questions his sexuality, it leaves the questions: am I really straight or am I straight enough? Ask yourself: if everyone has their own percentage of straight to gay, what percentage would you be? This project has been in the making for almost two years, involving twenty plus actors, multiple camera men, sound and lighting crew, all on zero budget. I am awed and inspired by the generosity of all these amazing artists.
cast: Leigh Dunham, Shannon Esper, Stephanie Fieger, Cassandra Freeman

title: Hillary
des: When Brooklynite Hillary gets dumped, she discovers that karma and fate have a sense of humor.
cast: Christina Zorich, Hannah Hodson, Rain Pryor, John Borruso

title: Apart
des: Four months after his girlfriend left him, Ashton is heartbroken and looking for a way to win her back. His roommate has other plans.
cast: Cameron Kelly, Taylor Martorana, Katherine Maya, Jonathan Scott Parker

title: Off the Aisle
des: Off The Aisle is a ten minute short about love overcoming all obstacles. It's Perrie Baker's (Emilia Petryszyn) big day, not that it feels that way to her, as Claire Watson (Helen Minassian) has controlled every bit of planning. Nerves get the better of Perrie, and her bridesmaids (Serena Chloe Gardner, Lucy Scarfe) are left trying desperately to get her to the church on time. As Logan Watson (Adam Alexander) receives word of his missing bride-to-be, his brother and best man (Tommy Bastow) is more worried about chatting up the birds. Can Logan keep his mother and Perrie's father (Nick Wilton) in the dark about the change of plans? And will there be a happy ending to the Watson-Baker wedding?
cast: Adam Alexander, Tommy Bastow, Serena Chloe Gardner, Helen Minassian

title: Aspie Seeks Love
des: A fearless outsider has been searching for love longer than many of us have been alive.
cast: David Matthews

title: Shameless
des: A woman on trial for prostitution turns the tables on her accusers.
cast: Kevin Mukherji, Omi Vaidya, Ronobir Lahiri, Karthik Srinivasan

title: Rubber Duckie
des: Rubber Duckie is the story of Jesse and Daniel, who on a blazing summer afternoon, are consumed with boredom and push their own limits and boundaries. This leaves us begging the question; is it simple boredom or insatiable innate appetite for more?
cast: Max Hambleton, Adam Vaughn

title: The Magi
des: A modern tale of a young, recently immigrated couple attempting to make it in NYC. But will their love for each other get in the way of their dreams? Features Eve Hewson (This Must Be the Place, Enough Said, Blood Ties, daughter of Bono) and Luke Treadaway (Attack the Block, Tonight Your Mine, winner of the Laurence Olivier Award for Best Actor). Shot by cinematographer Robbie Ryan (Philomena, Fish Tank, Wuthering Heights). Marks the fictional debut of successful video and commercial director Charles Mehling.
cast: Johnny Hopkins, Luke Treadaway

title: The Slap
des: A single mom with a unique deformity and a bad temper catches her teenage son in a peculiar position after leaving him alone in a luxury hotel room for several hours.
cast: Melyssa Ford, Elise Neal, Michael Otis, Damon Stone

title: Come Away With Me
des: Still believing in true love Ann Chambers is determined to finally live life her way. She summons the courage to attend her High School reunion to find the love of her life, Michael Blake, an all-star athlete and war veteran. Torn apart by war and misunderstanding, life remains full of surprises for them both.
cast: Ellen Gerstein, Charles Robinson

title: My Own Korean Drama
des: In his attempt to salvage his relationship with his girlfriend Susie, James soon finds himself stuck in his own version of a 'Korean Drama', filled with love triangles, deception, secrets, and ridiculous plot twists.
cast: Leon Sheen, Chad Yazawa

title: Love & Elevators
des: Three friends that host a very popular podcast radio show about relationships go through their own trials and tribulations in their own personal lives. All 3 friends are at different points in their relationships and learning a lot about who they are in the process.
cast: Tai Anderson, Erica Sutherland, Tavares M. Wilson, DuJuan Paxton

title: Man Eater
des: A narcissistic young woman is looking to meet a man to show her the high life. After matching with an eligible bachelor on a dating app, she feels she's just hit the jackpot, but shortly after she discovers that her dream guy isn't at all who she imagined him to be.
cast: Risa Stone, Victoria Kucher, Shannon Kook, Caroline Toal

title: 1. e4
des: A lonely widower stumbles upon a mysterious encrypted message in the personal ads. He deciphers the code and discovers that it's a chess move. He answers in kind and begins playing an innocent game of chess an with an unknown player. Playing the game and getting secret messages start to fill a void in his life. Despite not knowing their identity, he starts to fall in love with his opponent. The game continues and as the messages get more flirtatious, the codes get harder to crack, and he finds himself desperately trying to keep the game going.
cast: Jason Frost, Ariadne Shaffer, Nikki McCauley

title: Reverse Cowgirl
des: High end art dealer, Diana, rediscovers herself and her husband while navigating extra-marital affairs with aspiring painter, Vincent and Bambi, her former college roommate.
cast: Lisa Ferreira, Clark Jackson, Richard Carroll Jr., Michelle Lynn Wilson

title: Craning
des: An uncomfortable first date between two people evolves in an unexpected direction after an honest confession about the past leaves them wondering whether a true and meaningful connection is even possible.
cast: Michelle Arthur, Elizabeth Bates, Lidiya Korotko, Luke Loving

title: Highland Fling
des: When shooting a TV show that documents reality, sometimes what goes on behind the camera is more interesting than the show itself... In the romantic comedy "Highland Fling," two television show producers, with opposing views and conflicting styles, go on-location to document a visit by HRH Prince Edward of Great Britain to a small Southern town in America which is hosting a Scottish Highland Games Festival. These two monumentally different human beings, a fun-loving Scotsman and a straight-laced Southern Belle, came to document reality but reality shouldn't always be documented.
cast: Adam Boyer, Noah Jackson Boyer, Ashley Hobgood, Eaddy Mays

title: The Nature of Daylight
des: An exploration of love and loss, the film delves into memory and the desire to hold onto moments as they fade, determined to live on.
cast: Ciaran Kellgren, Phoebe Dynevor

title: Girl in Her Twenties
des: In this comedy-drama with a modern twist, meet Allison in three moments: her early twenties, mid-twenties, and late twenties, coming together to reveal her ever-changing identities and ever-complicated relationships.
cast: Amy Reedy Asbjørnsen, Zack Cosby, Lauren Harper, Erik Reedy

title: Dirty Dreams
des: This is a comedy about a couple named Tom (Efraiem Hanna) and Amanda (Whitney Star) who are looking for work. In the meantime, Tom has dreams about making love that cause him to perform those acts in bed, in his sleep. These actions wake up Amanda, and make her angry at him for supposedly dreaming about other women. They both eventually find work and they celebrate. After wards, Tom has difficulty sleeping and decided to pretend he's having one of his 'Dirty Dreams' to tease her. Includes original songs by Whitney Star such as 'Cry Baby,' and '(All I Have is) Love for You.'
cast: Efraiem Hanna, Whitney Star

title: Resistance;
des: A young woman named Angel contemplates taking her own life after losing the love of her life in a stabbing.
cast: Cole Ruybalid, Alexus VanHoosen

title: Vignette

cast: Dorian Alexie, Bowen Boice, Ashley Kozell, Ryan Sutherland

title: Mumblecore
des: Tao Lin and Megan Boyle document conversations in their everyday, albeit drug-addled, existences, recording their relationship using only a laptop computer.
cast: Megan Boyle, Tao Lin

title: Miki
des: After his Buddhist mother suddenly dies of cancer, an alcoholic comic on the road reluctantly reunites with his estranged Jewish high school sweetheart in Chicago.
cast: Kayci Campbell, Stacy Fan, Junko Goda, Gunner Greyson

title: Heaven
des: Having trouble returning to his pre-prison sexual orientation, an ex-con orders an aging call girl whose life depends on him wanting her.
cast: Walter Fauntleroy, Javon Johnson, April Parker Jones, Miana Marsh

title: The Girl at the Library
des: A hopeless romantic writer who goes to the library everyday gets a surprise visit from a hipster musician who flirts with her. They continue to flirt for days until one of them finds out the other is not who she says she is and is hiding a secret that may change their life.
cast: Bridget Johnson, Hannah Kopen, Maggie Cramer

title: Love Refreshed
des: Add a Plot
cast: Matt Devine, Gabe Erikson, Tellier Killaby, Jen Lilley

title: Rose

title: The Other Side of Home
des: When Helen dies young, leaving her husband behind to mourn to her, she finds herself in a surreal yet familiar afterlife. The similarly deceased prior owner of her house shows her a silent view of the living world - in a mirror - through which Helen witnesses her husband and another woman. Despite the ritual being dangerous for both the living and the dead, Helen is compelled to contact him.
cast: Tallulah Sheffield, Michael Maloney, Mark Bonnar, David Elliot

title: Sequence
des: A series of four narrative films about lonely junkyard workers, middle-aged women who've had too much to drink, jealous lovers, emotional Priests and amateur artists. Like a collection of short stories from a book (think Raymond Carver or Roald Dahl), Sequence is a body of work that was formed from common thematic constructs: loneliness, acceptance and trying to make amends with the past. Sometimes comedic, sometimes sad, always soulful, Sequence sets out to explore those small pieces of life that usually go unnoticed but make all the difference in the world.
cast: Arrmon Abedkichi, Robert Arender, David Aaron Baker, Suzanna Best

title: Catch Me Now
des: When love's a game, and life's a race, why not let yourself be caught by the one that got away.

title: So, You Want to Be in Pictures?
des: An aspiring actor reluctantly becomes a stuntman.

title: To Fall in Love With Anyone, Do This
des: To Fall in Love With Anyone, Do This is a film inspired by a New York Times article of the same name. The story explores two people reading from a list of questions developed by a psychologist interested in recreating the experience of falling in love. Merryn and Wyatt read from these questions in their struggle to determine whether they should stay in each other's lives in the lasting wake of a horrible tragedy. Their love runs deep, but is love really enough?
cast: Beth Gallagher, Eric Casalini, Heidi Bridges, Jordan Jacobo

title: The Pamplemousse

title: My Mind's Own Melody
des: Jack Winton ceased to live a long time ago. He's alive, sure - today is his thirty-seventh birthday, but he isn't living. No, Jack Winton isn't alive at all. In order to live you have to something to live for, Jack doesn't. Everyday is a kaleidoscope of different greys. His life has no music in it, no joy. If they only knew that he was once a man with dreams. Everyone has forgotten that man, even Jack. But everything can change. And will change for Jack. His life will open up to a new world, a new way. It is the story a new love and a new life.

title: The Only People Who Have Ever Seen Rob's Penis

title: To Us
des: On the night of their wedding, David and Beth arrive at their hotel room with expectations of a memorable night. Instead, they discover they perceive love differently, and question what is true in their relationship.

title: The Cinderella Effect
des: In modern-day Hollywood where movie stars are royalty, wannabes are cynics, and networking is the only reason to throw an after-party, can a hopeless romantic get the fairy-tale ending of his dreams? THE CINDERELLA EFFECT is a gay-themed, musical romp into that very possibility. Full of original songs, tongue-in-cheek humor, and classic film genre staples, THE CINDERELLA EFFECT is that rare Hollywood love-story that invites its audience to love Hollywood just as much as its two love-struck characters do.
cast: Alexander Abrahamian, Kari Benson, Julie Bouris, Wil Bowers

title: The Bridge
des: After a family tragedy Carly Evans was unable to cope with a new set of problems. Withdrawn and hopeless she isolated herself from friends, family and her church. In her weakness, she finds herself alone on the bridge contemplating suicide when a mysterious girl appears and reveals part of the future. The girls message reignites Carly's faith in God. With a change of heart Carly sets out to restore old relationships while waiting for a new one. She experiences a future full of hope and unexpected love. Has she finally found something to live for?
cast: Leanne Lower, Dan Scarberry, Julie Burget, Carol Gravelyn

title: Laps
des: Self-Improvement is hard. For Nathan, becoming the man he wants to be gets closer with each step ...or is he just running in circles?
cast: Art Hall, Rachae Thomas, Paul Dillon, Michael Siegel

title: Natives
des: Rachel and Anita, a young Manhattanite couple, are visiting Anita's parents on the Indian reservation she grew up on, for the first time as a couple. Anita, estranged from her parents, wants the fact that they are a couple to be kept secret. In private moments Rachel fights to convince Anita that they should come out to Anita's parents and in public tries to build a relationship of her own with Anita's parents, chiefly by demonstrating her reverence for Indian culture--a culture which Anita has no interest in. As Rachel's attempts to connect with the parents become more and more desperate, Anita begins to question whether her background is what attracted Rachel to her in the first place.
cast: Kendra Mylnechuk, Emily Young

title: My Cornerstone

cast: Zenia Starr, Romin Khan, James Morcan, Savita Starr

title: Onward

title: Amy

title: The Son of an Afghan Farmer
des: Muhad, a Muslim boy from Afghanistan, attends college in California, where he falls in love with an American journalism student, Victoria. Shortly after, his father suffers a stroke and Muhad must return home to tend to the family farm. As time passes, most of the crops are wiped out by the ongoing drought. Muhad is forced to head North with the rest of the farmers to harvest the poppies. Victoria has settled into her new life as a journalist for a local newspaper in San Francisco. When she follows a lead on a story about the ongoing war on drugs in Afghanistan, she is surprised to find her once innocent, first love is now a major player in the opium poppy trade.
cast: Tui Asau, Jamie Tisdale, Maya Hazen, Garen Boyajian

title: The Romantic Introvert's Dilemma

title: And They Call It Puppy Love

As their romance blossoms, trust and dependency form, but when Vincent learns that Craig is a drug dealer, his life begins to unravel. And when Craig finds himself in danger, he turns to Vincent with an almost impossible request...

title: Turkey Day

title: Road to Pride
des: This documentary is both a literal and symbolic journey on the 'Road to Pride', as the filmmakers embark on a quest to find out how South African lesbians are enjoying the fruits of a progressive constitution in the New South Africa. At the beginning of the film we meet a witty, young lesbian called Maggie who sets off on a road trip from Cape Town to Johannesburg to attend Gay Pride there. Against this backdrop of the beautiful, ever-changing African landscapes on her travels, we are introduced to a diverse range of compelling South African lesbians and their stories. Through personal and intimate conversations, we are taken on a journey of sexual discovery, self acceptance and ultimately self pride.
cast: Lesedi Mogoathle, Inger Smith

title: Guilt

His clientele are regular people who suffer from loneliness, and desire love. Once Q is paid, he then shoots the target with a love dart causing them to fall instantly in love with the person. One night Jason, a desperate young man, goes to Q to get his ex-girlfriend back. Unfortunately, this time Q makes a mistake and shoots the wrong girl. That's when things get complicated...

title: Archangel Alpha
des: In the shadow of an imminent ice age, Elena's nation of Praetoria is locked in a decade-long war with the Socialist Republics Directorate (SRED). On the surface, it is a war for dwindling resources, but in reality it is a life and death struggle for survival. Elena encounters Alexandra, the SRED ace of aces, first in the skies above her homeland and then again during a chance meeting in civilian life. Elena's friend and mentor, Grigori, cautions against getting involved with her. Bryn, Alex's wingman and confidante, advises the same. However, Elena and Alexandra are drawn together by a singular event and start an ill-fated relationship. Try as they might, the four friends find themselves drawn into a tangle of intrigue, betrayal and heartbreak as nationalistic pride and religious fanaticism set their worlds on a spiraling path to destruction.
cast: Nichelle Aiden, Katherine Joan Taylor, Don Lee, Nicol Razon

title: The Last Call
des: JAMES BUTLER is a very successful high end product salesman in his mid-30s and leaves his fabulous house and equally attractive wife, to travel down to London to meet his regional boss it is just another ordinary day for James, until he meets sexy JASMINE. Sparks fly, as they get attracted to each other. In James hotel room they flirt, dance and kiss. The romantic night turns violent, when Jasmine uses James tie to strangle him. There is a tussle and James is close to unconsciousness, when he picks up a vase and hits Jasmine over the head and kills her. James is shocked and stunned. Who is Jasmine? Who has sent her to kill James? The Last call James receives reveals it all.
cast: Paul Campion, Rod Lyons, Rachel Marquez, Janine Pardo

Once John comes back, he completely changes as a person: he is depressed and has fallen out of love. One night, Milo meets Alina, an all around American girl turned prostitute, who takes a liking to Milo. As Milo and Alina form an unexpected romance, Milo's idealistic views fog his opinion to Alina's way of life. Milo is faced with the choice of either following his true self or his true love.

Each outfit brings her back to a specific memory of her promiscuous past. Finally, she reconnects with her ex and they share an unexpected moment. After this tragic event occurs his mother dies of a heart attack and he is sent to a children's home. Before he gets to this home everyone already knows about his Dad's reputation and labels him as a crazy person, a case of mistaken identity! The president of the home (Ms. Wellington) waits for him to arrive, seeking revenge from the murder that his father committed. The guy that was murdered was Ms. Davenport's brother! She couldn't get revenge from his dad so, she wanted to take it out on Richard Jr. After this he tries to deal with his own complicated emotions while trying to deal with his relationship with Angela. Meanwhile the police chief, Chief Flemmings, played by Jesse Bush struggles to search and find the reasons why he's chasing him LAME

Traveling across the urban and natural landscapes of Angola, the couple go from a Chinese karaoke in Shanghai Bahia to the ship graveyard at Santiago beach. Through this voyage, Liberdade and Betty struggle to forge the yet uncreated consciousness of their race.

title: Lovers Lane
des: FRANKIE (short for Francesca) and GEORGE have been together since they were teenagers. Now both 30, it is time to re-examine their life together. LOVERS LANE is an intimate portrait of a relationship over the course of one weekend. We witness two contrasting days that reveal much about the characters and the nature of their long term relationship. Saturday is stifling and claustrophobic - the couple's house feels small, like a prison cell; the garden an exercise yard. Sunday sees the couple out walking on the South Downs - out in the open. Looking down on the town where they live, they are able to talk more freely and gain a new perspective.

With nothing to live for, he joins the United States Army hoping to find meaning, but cannot seem to forget his one and only purpose that forever altered his world. While fleeing from a terrorist attack, Andrew finds himself being called by God. des: Meet Anne Blythe. Smart, successful and desperately single. After yet another failed relationship and aware of her inability to find Mr. Right, Anne enlists the services of a dating agency, only to discover it isn't a dating agency at all but an exclusive arranged marriage service. Arranged marriages work for millions of women around the world but can a woman like Anne really marry a perfect stranger? Arranged is a fun and heartfelt look at love from the left-brain perspective. Challenging conventional courtship and romantic ideals, Anne's story unravels the roles of chance, choice and trust in the pursuit of tying the knot.

title: Queen

Here, Queen Dido is an opera singer from Trinidad who is inspired by the post-coital cannibalism of praying mantises. She sings the famous lament to lure Aeneas, a New York graffiti artist, to her industrial boudoir. Once Aeneas arrives, he is summoned by a strange, giggling and sleepy guard who instructs him to lay down on the Shag Carpet of Death. Aeneas awaits his doom, almost desiring it. When Queen Dido arrives they begin to have sex, an enjoyment that ends in tragedy as Queen Dido carries out her insect-inspired desire.

We follow their love transform from passive hellos to romantic moments through flashbacks in what feels like a lifetime of memories. At first glance, one would think he has his addictions, and successful life in check. His lifestyle, and lovely caring wife are evidence of this. But something brews behind Trevor's eyes, corrosively attacking his psyche after a chance encounter with a seductive Asian lady named, Shi. Tantalized by her beauty and freedom she brings behind closed doors, Trevor loses control of his life, as his demons return. 'But did Trevor ever really have his life under control?' we ask, after learning, in the balance between what is beyond our understanding, and what is earthly.... Trevor's life was never what it seemed to have been.

Starring Olivier Award-winning actress Janie Dee and acclaimed young actor Reece Noi, The Bathroom is a charming short comedy written and directed by award-winning playwright Sam Peter Jackson, with music by Grammy-winning composer David Arnold.

title: The Power of Love
des: A little love goes a long way, including right back to you. One woman's simple gesture to strangers changes their lives--and hers-- in this feel-good film. Bethany lost her job and found her life--traveling and watching people. Her web site about Wiccan kittens generates Google ad cash, and she gets to explore new places like Fiji, Turks and Cacaos, Minneapolis and Saint Paul--anyplace she has FaceBook friends she can crash with. This particular afternoon, she's so touched by a man's offer of help she gives him a big hug, fixing his bad back and making her feel good. Throughout the day, she runs into everyday people who divulge their stories. They need hugs, and she gives them. But who's going to hug her?
cast: Aimee McCrary, Daniel Will-Harris, Bettina Devin, Ogie Zulueta

title: Shura feat. Talib Kweli: Touch

title: The Potential Wives of Norman Mao
des: Norman Mao is an overweight, and socially-awkward junior businessman from Hong Kong, who at the age of 33 is still a virgin and unwed. Desperate to get him married, his parents take him on an international junket across the globe to find him a worthy Chinese wife. The Maos arrive to a New York City hotel, which is their final stop on their trip and their last hope to find Norman a bride. Having hired a professional matchmaking service, the Maos meet with three matches for Norman. Will one of these women be a potential wife for Norman or is he destined to lead a terribly lonely life?

But do they end up with Mr. and Mrs. Right? Who is to say where love will take you when you change who the driver is.

title: The Woodcutter
des: A film within a film, The Woodcutter chases the budding romance of two modern-day teenagers through the nostalgic projection room and cinema of Sydney's Hayden Orpheum Cinema Palace into the eerie 1930s Italian countryside. Questioning the curse of the rare 1930s film reel in their possession, the teens discover the true horrors of The Woodcutter as the boundaries between reality and fantasy become beautifully blurred. The Woodcutter is both a celebration of iconic cinema and an exploration of modern suspense and film noir. With references to classic horror and historic Sydney architecture, it is as much a tribute to the film world as it is a picturesque entertainment piece in its own right.
cast: Ben Mortley, Shannon Ashlyn, Adam Peachie Brandon, Isabel Macmaster

title: Second Honeymoon

Things get complicated when his agent hires the girl who trashed him in a review to remake his image so he can get gigs once again. Drew Taylor and Meghan Grace O'Leary star in this romantic comedy about music, love, and being true to the heart.

title: The Third Act
des: Katie Gordon met Tom Nichols while playing in summer stock at the Red Bridge Playhouse in Connecticut. Twelve years later, Katie, by then a well-known actress, made her play for Tom. They began an intense affair that ends disastrously. A dozen years after their breakup and again desperately unhappy with her life, Katie encounters Tom a third time when he returns to Red Bridge to play a fund-raiser for the theater in which he and Katie had played summer stock. Now a successful musical playwright, Tom's songs for his hit Broadway musical become the score for Katie's re-awakening as she must confront her past and decide her future when she and Tom finally play their 'Third Act'.

title: Emphatique
des: Rachel, a passionate, complicated, and talented young woman, has a ton of issues and has had many tumultuous relationships -- living from friend to friend, to sofa to sofa, from crash to crash. One day, upon the recommendation of her former friend Maya, an almost miraculous event occurred that changed her life forever. A character study of diverse and dynamic characters portrayed by gifted actors. A poignant story of people with unique and interesting interconnections.
cast: Shanti Ashanti, Delilah Pappas, Amber Wojcik, Maria Peyramaure

title: Dating Mr. Darcy
des: Charlotte is an independent, career-driven, modern woman with a passion for the literary works of Jane Austen and the Brönte sisters. Their stories have shaped her ideal man with the likes of Mr. Darcy, Mr. Rochester and Heathcliff, and nothing less will suffice. Persuaded by her best friend Alicia to get back into the dating game, she dates three men who turn out to be modern versions of her literary crushes. The dates are a total disaster, but Alex, the outgoing and charming bartender, comes to the rescue to put her experiences into perspective and to be the first man ever to make Charlotte laugh. Is he, then, the One? Maybe not, as his fiancée and soon-to-be bride walks into the pub to sweep him away. With her though, is Alex's brother Daniel, an awkward-looking but strangely attractive guy. Although very different from Charlotte's ideal beau, perhaps reality can surpass the dream.
cast: Thomas Barry, Helena Bloomer, Jessica Brooks, Lee Cattley

title: Faded Love

title: Shabbat Dinner
des: Shabbat Dinner is boring as usual for William Shore. His mother has invited two crazy hippies and their son and is doing her best to show off, his father is drunk and berating their oddball guests, and he doesn't have much in common with their son Virgo. That is, until Virgo tells him that he has just come out as gay. In William's room, the boys speak directly to each other about themselves, while just a few feet away the adults discuss trivialities about prep school, marrying Jewish, and nonfat ice cream. Shabbat Dinner opens a window into the world of Upper Middle Class New York society, with its myriad rules and tensions. In telling the coming out story of two boys, it addresses universal issues of finding acceptance and truth as a teenager.
cast: Eva Kaminsky, Chris London, Dan Shaked, Peter Tedeschi

title: Elon + Emmanuelle

Two people meet to exchange a few words but end up trading more. Cigarettes, booze, neon lights, romance and Shanghai - all that comes together in Shanghai Story. Because, you know... life is full of surprises.

title: All I Want
des: Long time childhood friends Jay and Sydney have loved each other since they could remember and how could they not, considering the fact that everything in their lives mirrored like a parallel universe. Both growing up as the children of two "Mega Church" Pastors, Jay and Sydney understand both the thrills and ills of church life all too well. As they begin to leap into the next chapter of their lives as husband and wife things begin to take a nasty turn and the couple finds themselves not being on the same page. Little do they know that jealous and vindictive people are lurking right under their noses that would love more than anything to see the demise of their relationship. With the couple being crowded with interference from overbearing family, friends and church members, will this couple find themselves calling it quits on Christmas Day or will their relationship be strong enough to survive against the odds?
cast: Cedric Pendleton, Angela Ardis, Jerry Black, Antonio Brown

title: Going Home
des: Charlie Stevens is the son of a high-powered lawyer, who wants Charlie to follow in his footsteps. Charlie's in college and is doing well, but he can't sleep and has strange dreams. Something is wrong with Charlie, but he doesn't know what. He returns home at semesters-end to his family; a cute, independent-minded sister, his meek mother and his workaholic father. While home, he runs across a couple of slacker friends of his from high-school who like to party - a strange, new world for Charlie. Hoping for a change, Charlie goes to one of their parties and meets free-spirited & quirky Abby. As Charlie and Abby's relationship blossoms, she helps him realize what's wrong in his life and how to fix it.
cast: Rebecca Burleson, Michelle Caughlin, Shea Duerler, Dennis Dwulet

title: The Shape of Rex
des: THE SHAPE OF REX begins with Rose, a married woman in her late thirties, visiting her old, married boyfriend Rex for the first time in over twenty years to tell him, finally, that he is the father of her daughter. The film follows the events that are triggered by that visit, coupled with a parallel recounting of their coming-of-age love story in the 1980s. Rex and Rose (Ryan Hollyman and Monica Dotter, who also happen to be a married couple in real life) are married to others, but their marriages are rocked when they fall into an illicit affair based upon the long-suppressed and unresolved issues of their youthful romance. In a parallel story set in the mid 1980s, young Rex and Rose (Vivien Endicott-Douglas and Brett Donahue) are teenage lovers who bare their souls in a confessional ritual just before being irreparably torn apart by a raging father (J.D. Nicholsen). This is a story about the nature of love, about people who love each other in ways that cannot be reciprocated. The issue throughout is whether or not Rex and Rose ought to try to complete the arc of their teenage love, one that under other circumstances might have lasted forever.
cast: Brett Donahue, Ryan Hollyman, Vivien Endicott Douglas, Monica Dottor

title: Mehndi

title: Albert and Alice
des: Albert and Alice live on the Lower East Side of Manhattan. Alice paints a picture of an angel. The angel becomes a real entity and decides to take Albert on a Magical Mystery Tour of the Lower East Side. Alice doesn't understand and leaves Albert. Albert contacts the angel and thinks that he is a Messiah. He tries to convert members of a strange cult called the 'Plutonians' but is knocked out by the leader. Albert finds Alice with another guy, whom after an argument, decides to knock Albert out. Albert finds himself in court with his ex boss and ex drug dealer and sings 'Stalker in Paradise'. The Angel convinces Alice to go back to Albert and together they sing 'Joy'.
cast: Buddy Bowzer, Andru Cann, Zachary Curtis, Laura Falkner

title: Bollywood Invasion
des: As a kid, Rahul hated it when his mom would pressure him to impress house guests with dance moves, especially since he couldn't dance. Now in college, Rahul's found his groove in the classroom and out of the spotlight. One evening, while going to his car, he crosses paths with a group of student dancers practicing for a big Bollywood dance competition that's just days away. Among them is Sonia, a beautiful and confident dancer to whom Rahul is immediately drawn. Following a challenge by her arrogant co-captain, Sonia recruits Rahul onto the team. He may be willing to learn the steps, but the question is will Rahul be able to overcome his fear of the spotlight in time for the big show?
cast: Anand Desai-Barochia, Amna Mazin, Niraj Mehta, Shreem Venkatesh

title: Swen

As a surprise for Charlotte, Henry also invites his eccentric mother Sally and Charlotte's overbearing father Gordon. The surprise, however, is the truth about Sally and Gordon. Hilarity, the occasional tender moment, and the promises and pitfalls of filmmaking ensue as all try to keep their various secrets from being spilled.

After many attempts, Hyatt persuades Cassidy to salvage their union. But before his marriage could gain any traction, PAM BRYANT, 25, Hyatt's lover, reveals their torrid affair. Meanwhile, Ben struggles to find compromise between his desire and his gentlemanly ways. Can old flames be rekindled? Can you ever be sure you've found the right one? Do nice guys always finish last? They hope to find answers but the lines between love, lust and desperation may be more blurred than they ever believed.

He has big dreams of being a web designer. He sees life as a game, and he's still trying to get to the next level. Dara comes to get qualifications to further her practice. A film that's designed to explore and show the truth of the pick up artist industry through an experimental format involving two subjects, one introvert who's never had any love encounters, and one extrovert who's in the search for multiple girlfriends. They go through their journeys with knowledge provided to them by top experts in this 30 year old industry.

She warns suspecting women of their relationship troubles ahead and pleads with them to find self-resolve before it's to late. Actress/radio host, Tammi Mac is bag lady in this dramatic and mystical Alfred Hitchcock type series.

title: iDesire
des: Unrequited love, a familiar feeling from an unfamiliar source.

title: Heartless: The Story of the Tinman

title: As Ever
des: The year is 1944. College student, James Roman faces the fears of the draft while also dealing with the everyday happenings of life. Inspired by the experiences and writings of Producer Jessi Partridge's grandfather.

title: WKND + LVR
des: Sex. Pain. Love. For 20-something Yani, a former ballet dancer, life flows exactly in that order. Visiting her older sister Serita in New York City, Yani must come to terms with the death of her father. Instead, she buries her sorrows in wasted days of aimless wandering, pity and pretty nail polish. After a heated discussion on a Friday, her older sister urges her to try something new and meet up with her at a peace rally for police brutality. That evening, Yani meets Chad, a straight-faced, 30-something lawyer who is serious about all the right things - including eating his pizza with a fork and knife. After a passionate one-night-stand, Yani and Chad are inseparable for the weekend as they make love in strange places and eventually face their ultimate fear - reality. As the Queen of Self-Sabotage, Yani strikes up a fight with Chad, and finds herself sobbing in the arms of her beloved sister Serita. Feeling defeated, Yani travels back home to Pittsburgh, PA, where she finds solace in her comfort zone of pity. A week later, a chance knock at the door - the postman - leads to Yani opening a letter from Chad. His heart is signed, sealed and delivered in the form of a one-way ticket back to NYC. Yani and Chad reunite at the New York City ballet where a kiss seals their fate of forever.
cast: Khalimah Gaston, Angelo Diaz, Racquel Townsend, Cornelius Jefferson

title: The Water Stinger
des: A young deceitful Chinese student is forced to bond with an elderly warm-hearted Australian retired boxing champion, who helps him become an honest man, thus wins the girl of his dream after defeating a local conman.

After a few years Paul and Mary Kay met and fell in love. This union of marriage is a testimony that people can be strong, vital and full of life at any age. Paul and Mary Kay prove that love can last a lifetime.

title: A Private Storm

title: Finding Samantha Dixon
des: Finding Samantha Dixon tells the story of Joshua, who finds an iPhone in an empty field and decides to track down the owner of the phone, a beautiful young woman named Samantha Dixon. But what begins as a lighthearted odyssey turns into a real mystery as all of her contacts and friends report not having seen her in weeks.
cast: Jordy Williams, Allison Hawkstone, Gabriela Bautista, Victor Cole

title: Skin on Skin
des: "Skin on Skin" is a short film about the dreams that lie just beneath our skin. Based on the memoir, "Runway Runaway, A Backstage Pass to Fashion, Romance & Rock 'n Roll," Skin on Skin tells the true story of a runaway teenage girl who follows her dream to travel the world - against all odds becomes model/muse to the most iconic fashion designers in Paris. After the death of the 'love of her life,' (lead guitarist Steve Clark of mega rock group-Def Leppard) she moves home to Hollywood where dreams are made of. Realizing that fairytale stories with happy endings where the 'dream man comes to the rescue' never come true, she reinvents herself as an inspirational entrepreneur whose gifts, talents, and life experiences, encourage others to follow their dreams. 'When we give ourselves permission to follow our dreams, our genius takes over and no one can stop us." Lorelei Shellist Accessibility: Because dreams are for everyone, our all inclusive cast and crew is diverse, multilingual, all shapes and sizes, and includes deaf talent. Skin on Skin was written, produced and directed by Lorelei Shellist on a Go Fund Me campaign of $17,079. It contains new footage shot in LA, as well as archival fashion show footage, and original, never seen before VHS footage shot by Lorelei in circa 1980's.
cast: Daryll Agustin, Daryll Augustin, Kaitlyn Brown, Fidel Bryan

title: Arm's Length
des: A young man meets an older woman who teaches him how to let someone be close, and then keep them at Arm's Length.

Every artificial pleasure is available, though what has been natural, like sleep, dream, love or timeless togetherness seems to be gone forever.

But now their mission is ending, and Joe's wife is waiting for him back home. Thinking she's going to lose him, Francesca takes desperate measures, leading to terrible and unintended consequences.

title: Love Hard
des: LOVE HARD is a work of docu-portraiture about BDSM and intimacy. In its inquiry into the loves and lives of 5 subjects, it presents thoughtful and compelling perspectives on how kink can function in our lives: as a practice of art or intimacy, a mode of expression or release, an iteration or obliteration of self, a way to play, to fuck, to love, to be ordinary.

title: Granger Smith: Happens Like That

title: Cyberslave
des: Cyberslave dramatizes the life of a struggling dominatrix and examines the complex virtual relationship she has with her slave. The film explores the dynamics of a contemporary BDSM relationship based on Financial Domination in a time of economic crisis. In a relationship like this one, who is really the slave?

title: Blood Below the Skin

They are high school classmates from different social circles, who form a bond in the wake of an unanticipated incident. Two of the girls are falling in love with each other against all expectations and the third girl is forced to mother her own mother after her father vanishes. Each girl seeks comfort within the walls of her bedroom where the music blasting from the turntable provides a magical synchronicity between them all.

title: Dyuet

title: The Ride of Tom & Valkyrie
des: This is the story of the heroic psychological journey of Tom, a depressed insomniac locked in a small Chinatown studio that he's afraid to leave. Grieving the loss of his wife and daughter, and tormented by memories of a dysfunctional family, he hallucinates about his childhood heroes: Ben Franklin, a samurai, a '70's sitcom star, and a comic book hero--all of whom help Tom in his struggle to maintain his sanity. Meanwhile, Valkyrie, Tom's beautiful neighbor--whom he has never met--zips across Manhattan on series of disastrous blind dates in pursuit of her goal "to find the last real man in New York City, by midnight, tonight.

title: Sex, Drugs and Sausage Rolls

The most central of which is about two hired killers that have been sent to a house in order to kill someone. They have no idea who this person is and neither do we. As the stories unfold and we learn more about the characters, suspicion starts to build as to who this 'victim' will be?

title: Pascha

title: Working It Out
des: Dustin seems to be living the happy life of a swinging NYC bachelor. By day, he works as a personal trainer, by night he hangs out with his boys from the gym, and every spare moment seems more than dedicated to staying in peek physical condition. After a gym member, Becky (the type of woman his wild friends wouldn't give a second look), Dustin begins facing some bitter realities of his life, both past and present. Combining comedy and drama, the film asks the question of whether you can really be honest with anyone unless you're honest with yourself...

title: Moon River
des: Moon River follows a couple trying to get away from their lives for a bit.
cast: Timothy Drennan, Heather White

title: mongoose8
des: Add a Plot
cast: Nina Bergman, Stephanie Gerard, Gladys Nyoth, Ser Anzoategui

title: In a Dream
des: KATE, a young office worker and aspiring pet portrait painter, is determined to find a mysterious man who keeps appearing in her dreams at night. Her acerbic co-worker and best friend, HEATHER, does not share Kate's conviction the Dream Man even exists, and she begins to get seriously concerned about her friend's state of mind when Kate sets out on a desperate quest to find the man based on clues she believes to be receiving from him. During her search, she goes through awful dates and mishaps - but the surprise ending provides revelations about the triumph of friendship, the benefits of adopting a pet, and the importance of following our dreams.
cast: Megan Elizabeth Barker, Lauren Pence, Kevin Sinic, Chris Pinto

title: Life with Miriam
des: A heartfelt eulogy has a profound affect on a group of attendees at a funeral.

title: Just Do You

title: Who Lives My Life?

cast: Giancarlo Abriola, Abigail Marlowe, Ryan Vincent

title: All of Her
des: A man tracks down and befriends the transplant recipients who received his deceased wife's organs. Everything goes smoothly until he falls for the woman who got his wife's heart and his friends must help him move on. Chase Fannon is nearly suicidal after his pregnant wife Angel is killed by a drunk driver. His best friend tries to get him to move on and make new friends, but he keeps flashing back to memories of better times. At a preliminary hearing, the drunk driver gets off and Chase attacks him in the courtroom. Because of the attack, Chase has to undergo grief counseling. Worse than that, he has to pay off and apologize to the drunk driver who laughs in his face. Chase's old friends think he's doing well when he finishes the grief counseling course. His best friend is not quite convinced, so he invites Chase's three new friends to a party. One is an old codger, another is a mafia type, and the third friend is a beautiful retro-hippie chick named Ann. Chase seems fine and his relationship with the young woman starts to grow. Then, one by one, his new friends finds out that they all received organs from Angel. The two men are fine with the fact that Chase tracked them down and made friends, but Ann fell hard for him and has a harder time accepting the depth of his grief. Finally, it's Ann who fights hard to help him face the guilt he still has over Angel's death. In the end, the new and old friends help Chase move on to a new life.
cast: Thomas Reeping, Nicholas Costello, Cristee Brianas, Ashley Uberti

title: Red
des: Nina and her friends dream of seeing the world outside of the toy store stock room.
cast: Robin K. Johnson, William Jeon, Andrew 'Fig' Figueroa, Brian Bell

title: No Clothes

title: Malal
des: Set in Kerala - the first Emirati production to shoot in the Indian state- Nayla Al Khaja's 'Malal' revolves around a young Emirati couple, on their honeymoon. Their approach to the relationship and commitment to the marriage is the theme of the film, providing a revealing and frank insight into the realities of arrange marriages and the challenges faced by modern-day Emirati couples.
cast: Hormuz Mehta, Nayla Al Khaja, Ghassan Al Katheri, Abdulrahman Al Madani

title: Frogger

title: How to Kill My Boyfriend

Alex is happy but Andy, John's best friend, almost ruins everything like always due to an affair. Misunderstandings, killers-for-hire, revenges etc. take part at the film but just at the last second, everything is restored.

title: Recessive
des: Shay is conflicted about whether to have a child with her wife, Norah. She struggles with her desire to be genetically connected to her own child--and with the knowledge that she may carry the marker for a serious genetic disorder. As Shay and Norah head off to the family home for the funeral of Shay's aunt, they must grapple with the nature of family, legacy, and parenthood. Recessive weaves experimental and personal documentary elements artfully into subtle acting to create a very modern, deeply emotional, narrative film.
cast: Abigail Boucher, Jessica Hudson

title: Trojans

Whether it's the quarterback who doesn't believe in himself, the girlfriend who is way too good to be true, the cocky star receiver who has to deal with a lovesick stalker or the coach who has seen better days Trojans throws them all together on the day of the championship game. Can they pull it together as a team or will they fall apart on the biggest stage of all?

title: Vertex

He enlists the help of two scientists, thought experimental physicist Tegmark and theoretical physicists Dr. Hugh Everett to try to find out how and why he has this ability and ultimately get him home, though they both have other ideas. Until he can get home, in one of the many universes he can jump to he decides to try and live a normal life with Eva.

title: Sweet Cider

Finn's tenacity turns out to be more than a match, however, and she finds that shaking him off won't be as easy as she'd hoped.

title: Verona

title: Acquainted

title: Unsaid
des: A lovesick boy finds a box of pictures of him and his then girlfriend which sets off a course of flashbacks down memory lane. However, it is revealed that the couple did not end on good terms, leading the boy to try and reconnect with someone he used to know so well.

title: Chris Young Losing Sleep

cast: Chris Young, Kiersten Dolbec

title: Justin Moore: Point at You

des: WILD is about the unsettling effect of a rumour on a teenage girl and how hard it is to decode a situation when trust and certainty have been undermined.
cast: Antonia Clarke, Gabrielle Dempsey, Abigail Kalikwani, Sam Lee

title: Silencio
des: A seven year old boy travels in Mexico with his mother, an addict to pain-killers who is unable to care for him and is hoping to persuade his dead father's family to take him off her hands. Emotionally alienated, the boy wanders around a hotel, taking refuge in his haunted imagination.
cast: Andrea Biestro, Dexter Camara, Gabrielle Galanter, Julieta Márquez

cast: Bill Mendieta, Tom Schanley, Jennifer Siebel Newsom, Genevieve Zweig

title: Jinx
des: Simon Urbanski is a loud mouthed oaf from Toronto, working in web design, and living with his girlfriend Ola Valere. After a brief argument with Ola, Simon decides to venture outside, only to run into his old high school friend Matt. Bringing up distant memories, they both announce the same word at once mid-conversation. Matt jinxes Simon, forbidding Simon to speak until someone utters his name. For the rest of the day, Simon struggles to make his way without words.
cast: Simon Urbanski, Ola Czuk, Brandon Wickens, Alex Gomez

title: Romantic
des: Poem Video of 'Romantic' by Randy Resh
cast: Peter Hodgins

title: Older Children
des: Privilege meets reality for the young and restless.
