title: Google Me Love
des: Young Chicagoans struggle with relationships and love in this technological age.
cast: Roslyn Alexander, Anu Bhatt, Adam Brown, Roberta Chung

title: An Item
des: Through the eyes of two young couples, AN ITEM takes a light-hearted look at the joys and disappointments of getting together and staying together. Or not.
cast: Matthew Philip Harris, Posy Sparey, Andrew Cazanave Pin, Indianna Ryan

title: Kitty Kitty
des: There's something VERY wrong with Val's boyfriend. A short thriller about love, cats and brain parasites.
cast: Caroline Duncan, Ben Messmer, Hank Bunker, Lily Holleman

title: Becoming Sophie
des: A young woman is trying to find the courage to follow her dreams.
cast: Ashley Alexander, Theo Devaney, Daniel Mallinson, Sydney Bell

title: A Touch of Stardust
des: A heartbroken romantic gets a magical second chance to marry the woman he believes is his fate.
cast: Yosiah Johnson, Samantha Russell, Rhyanne McDade, Chris Willis

title: Father-Like Son
des: Clark is a 24-year-old whose views on relationships are put to the test when his recently widowed mother marries a man his own age.
cast: Mac Alsfeld, Andrew Megison, Molly Conarro, Grayson Ward

title: Cyrus the Good
des: Prompted by a humbling attempt to interpret Farsi for a JFK detainee, and in realizing that he has become estranged from his cousin, Cyrus resolves to reconnect with his Persian roots. He simultaneously takes his cousin, Dariush, in to stay with him, while maintaining the lie that he is still in medical school, lest news get back to his family back home that he dropped out in order to pursue a career in comedy.
cast: Addison Anderson, Annette Berning, Lev Fer, Aden Hakimi

title: What We Talk About When We Talk About Love
des: Two couples are drinking before heading out to dinner. Soon, their conversation turns to the topic of relationships. As they head deeper into the night, more than just drinks are spilled.
cast: Shannon Spangler, Milan Sova, Erica Pappas, Joe Leitess

title: Interchange
des: 'Interchange' is a dramatic narrative short shot entirely within the metro system of Busan, South Korea. Over the course of a single ten minute take, 'Interchange' tells the story of a couple who is forced to confront the state of their relationship on a late-night subway ride.
cast: Ane van der Vyver, Christopher Beaulieu

title: Single Rules
des: Millie has been out of the dating scene for awhile and is ready to jump back in head first, into a pool with no water. Her rookie mistakes keep her friends on their toes as they try to help Millie break her bad dating habits. Beginners luck might just be on her side as we go on a journey where she will grow and better herself...with or without a man.
cast: Millie Torchetti, Marisa Kennedy, Anthony Michael Bucci, Elise Sievert

title: Unholy Roller
des: An assiduous student is struggling to find a date, when she falls for a guy over the Internet. Problems arise when they plan to meet in person.
cast: Sarah Ansley, Fausto Bernal, Eric Greiner, Greg Greiner

title: Quality Time
des: The story of a lesbian couple. Kim, a badass feminist who dreams of being the first female president, and her fiancee Henri, a lady time traveler and self-proclaimed History Knight, who has taken it upon herself to fix problems in history caused by time tourists who mess with the past.
cast: Amanda Steinhoff, Maikiko James, Dana Chapman, Jamie Baer

title: Torpor
des: Lucia strives to overcome the memory of a violent father. Will she succeed to bond with a promising young man or remain frozen by a trauma that will haunt her forever?
cast: Selina Doanvan, Maddison Ellen, Stuart Onslow, Nick West

title: Fatal Rhapsody
des: A pizza deliveryman's quest to win back his ex is thwarted when he's pulled into the turmoil of two deranged criminals with their own relationship woes.
cast: Thomas Nicholson, Lochlyn Munro, Steven Roberts, Starlise Waschuk

title: The Quantum Suicide of Sophie Miller
des: Burdened by repressed guilt and afflicted with a self-imposed incapacity to assign meaning to interpersonal relationships, a neurotic and introverted physics professor launches an absurdly rational scientific quest: to either prove by her life or disprove by her death a concurrently fantastic and infinitely alluring theory--quantum immortality. But it is a theory that ironically can only be proved by Sophie undergoing repeated experiments that in all probability will result in her death. For in each one of these experiments, there is a 50% chance she will live and a 50% chance she will die. Her continual Russian Roulette gambles are what is known as the thought experiment of Quantum Suicide.
cast: Alexia Poe, Anthony Carchietta, Aimee Snow, Larry Keeling

title: Boys & Girls: The Series
des: Cam and Brooklyn are two young NYC adults trying to get together and navigate their way through life, love, and sex in the city that never sleeps but there is just one problem.....their hormones!
cast: Alysia Joy Powell, Darik Bernard, Tationna Bosier, Brenda Raquel

title: If Memory Serves
des: The 1940's: A young cadet drafted to war and a woman drafted to poverty both struggle to find their identities against the hardships and villains of the day in this sentimental tribute to the bygone era of silent film.
cast: Matthew Englund, Morgan LeClaire, Joe Rapp, Patrick J. Thompson

title: What Goes Up
des: Lee & Ray are game developers. Lee loves Sarah but can't talk to her & when the universe mysteriously gifts him a cube that gives him visions of the future things change for him but not necessarily for the better.
cast: Calum C. Sutton, Hal Dimond, Francesca Louise White, Laolu Osinbaju

title: Like Salt
des: When living in diaspora turns into a boxing match, one learns to fight even with bare knuckles.
cast: Jessica Damouni, Ben Williams, Zayn Alexander, Salah Anwar

title: The Shingle Life
des: James has never had a girlfriend; his brother Ben is a ladies' man; their friend Willie has just been dumped. As Ben works to rebuild Willie's confidence, James secretly finds love with Willie's ex.
cast: Adam Anderson, Brett Anderson, Debbie Anderson, Brent Augustinack

title: Fourplay: Tampa
des: Satisfaction is hard to find in a Florida mall bathroom. A Chaplinesque gang-bang farce.
cast: Jose Villarreal, Carlos Treviño, Paul Soileau, Sammy DeSilva

title: Jimmy
des: Add a Plot
cast: Danni Wang, Zenon Zeleniuch, Andrei Posse, Marco Palou

title: Spasibo
des: Clement goes to Saint Petersburg for a film festival. When he gets there, nobody can hear him and see him. He vanished. He meets Andrei, a gay Russian who lives the same thing.
cast: Clément Bayart, Andrei Odintsov

title: Before I Forget
des: A man with amnesia slowly pieces his life back together in a series of memories that blend into his present, which vaguely remind him of a love triangle he started just before his near-death experience. Mentally damaged by a car accident, Jeremy questions the motives of two women in his life. His pregnant wife, Amanda, anxious to receive a one time buy-out of Jeremy's real estate company, is his power of attorney. Meanwhile, his former assistant, Tina, is trying to help him FORGET their past love affair. Discovering the truth will require him to face the past lies, and make a major decision about his future. The external pressures are too overwhelming for a man with the mind of a child.
cast: Amy Bolanos, Robert John Brewer, Sabra Miller, Evan Moua

title: The Last Night
des: A husband and wife finally end their marriage - on her terms.
cast: Chelah Horsdal, Mike Dopud

title: Forever, Ally
des: FOREVER, ALLY follows exchanges between Ronaldo, a gay black man, and a neighborhood cat named Ally. When Ally dies suddenly, it occurs to Ronaldo that she was his best friend. In contemplating solitude, he ruminates on the body, sex, nature, and how Ally knew him better than anyone. In return, Ally reflects on life of earth and tries to find understanding in Ronaldo's pent-up existence, ushering him toward opening up again. Her death prompts Ronaldo to reach out to his cute neighbor Dallas to help put her to rest, stirring up never-before realized feelings between them. Told primarily through lyrical missives between heaven, earth, and Ronaldo's cat-scratched sofa, this unique story offers a nuanced approach to death, friendship, and opening oneself up again.
cast: Ron Sims, John Henry Summerour

title: Two for the Show
des: Bryan comes into town to visit his dying Father for the last time and encounters an abused woman at his High School reunion. He falls for her and tries to get her out of the abusive relationship she's in.
cast: Michael McCallum, Liz Nolan, Denis Link, Joseph Mull

title: Sad Clown
des: Upon entering the dressing room, the Ringmaster finds a Clown that has drawn a frown and tears on his face where there used to be a smile. What is it that is making him so sad, when the show demands a happy clown?
cast: Jesse Frankson, Kelsey Eide, Darrin Shaughnessy, Noah Bremer

title: Nobblycarrot7
des: Nobblycarrot7 follows Ruby, a fruit and veg vendor who's learnt the ways of the world through Youtube tutorials and spends her days hiding behind her computer screen. When she falls for online DJ Vinyl Lionel she has to shut her laptop and go meet him for real. A romantic comedy about isolation through the internet, trolling and digital love.
cast: Alexandra Dowling, Nathan Laryea, Verity Mullan, Anthony Neverson

title: Longbox Breakup
des: LOVE IS LIKE A PUNCH IN THE GUT - FROM SUPERMAN. In the style of awkward high-school comedies like NAPOLEON DYNAMITE and MOONRISE KINGDOM, two teenage geeks fall in love and have to deal with the ups and downs of having very passionate opinions.
cast: Julia Breeze, Houston Coley, Mary Georgia Hamilton

title: Stigma
des: Stigma is about two African women that contracted HIV through their work as traditional birth attendant in a small village. One, the mother, could not stand the massive stigmatization from the society, friends even family and dies. The other, the daughter, refuse to die and fight against that stigmatization that kills the people living with HIV/Aids in Africa. A drama about ignorance and the consequences of carelessness. But also about the power to overcome desperate situations in life, to burst ones bonds and finally to be what you want to be.
cast: Jackie Appiah, Hilda Dokubo, Soibifaa Dokubo, Francis Duru

title: War of the Limelight
des: A love story between a Syrian refugee and the son of a Mexican illegal immigrant takes place amidst an ongoing racism- and classism-fueled war between two rival high schools.
cast: Taylor Desmond, Miguel Terrón, Kimberly English, Raydon Lobrin

title: Roses, Donors, and Other Audits
des: A mundane day at work is anything but, when his young friends inspire Frank to stand up to his boss in the name of love.
cast: Rudy Quintanilla, Edem Atsu-Swanzy, Seth Marshall, Camie J. Carpenter

title: Don't Touch Me
des: A short black comedy featuring a soulless couple who attend a swinger's party in an attempt to save their rocky relationship. The lady is very keen to participate, while the guy is against the idea. Things come to a head at the party, leading to a fatal ending.
cast: Tom Bonington, Jake Fisher, Joe Kallis, Sophie Linfield

title: Secret Love
des: A shy and intelligent photographer gets a chance with the boy of her dreams.
cast: Xuetong Cao, Aylia Colwell, Paris Dylan, Julie Zhan

title: A Girl from Another World
des: Persistence and pure luck help Sandra, a young girl from out of town, enter the world of high fashion and glamour in Los Angeles. As Sandra quickly discovers that success comes with a price, she also learns valuable life lesson.
cast: Chriss Anglin, Amy Berrian, Addie Daddio, Tara Ferguson

title: Tu Me Manque
des: Add a Plot
cast: Samantha Scaffidi, Joanna Janetakis, Laura Pellegrini, Tori Murray

title: Love Regardless
des: A struggling singer with a law degree takes a job at her friend's father's law firm. Events take a dramatic turn when her boss unexpectedly falls in love with her.
cast: Michelle McKinney Hammond, Paulina Oduro, Yvonne Okyere, Gbenga Titiloye

title: Madeline's Oil
des: Madeline's oil is a moving short film that follows the turning point in the lives of the 1800's Louisiana family. The strong heroine of the family does whatever it takes to save her daughter Madeline. Part American Western drama and part complex family saga, Madeline's oil delves into deep topics like love, racism, death, hate and dysfunction with realistic dialogue and lovable characters. It's a film that is sure to leave a lasting impression on audience members of all ages.
cast: Jency Griffin Hogan, Meg Jones, Judah Lejeune, Maddie Nichols

title: Nighttime
des: Two strangers experience a party in similar, yet different ways: one alone, one with a partner.
cast: Anna Grace Estes, Dylan Richardson, Owen White, Julia Nightingale

title: Impostor
des: A lonely office drone must resort to desperate measures for a date with the woman of his dreams.
cast: Agim Kaba, Bree Michael Warner, Michael Elian, Brooke Johnston

title: Finish Line
des: Closed off to the idea that a guy will ever like her, Meyer finds herself at a crossroads when she falls for Nick.
cast: George Butler, Izzy Cassandra-Newsam, Matteo Debole, Mady Dever

title: Iraade
des: A love story of intentions that never get across the right way causing the heroes to suffer and almost end in tragedy. Highlighting the importance of being truthful about desires and intentions, the importance of never giving up.
cast: Ashlesha Prabhu, Chirag Saluja, Akshay Kulkarni, Arush Paterya

title: Every Night I am Falling Out of Nowhere
des: Every night I am falling out of nowhere is a 15 minutes psychological drama with main theme the power of denial. The story takes place in London and follows Amy, an 18 year old high school girl that follows the same routine each day. When she is invited to a friend's party she ends up outside a hotel's room door.
cast: Aggy K. Adams, Jason Maddox, Trevor Murphy, Vinzenz Stergin

title: V Adamovom rúchu
des: Add a Plot
cast: David Hartl, Tomás Magát

title: Mail/Femail
des: A post-office worker meets a unique and enthusiastic 'femail' whose frequent visits to the mail room begin to revolutionize his monotonous life. He soon finds himself willing to overcome the walls that prevent him from enjoying the little things in life, and the challenges delivered when he just can't 'letter go.'
cast: Franklin Brown, Jesse Dupre, Taylor Nelson

title: Make It Up
des: Add a Plot
cast: Anne D'Almeida, Lison Daniel

title: The Red Valentine
des: When a pair of young lovers are discovered dead, a tangled web of deception unravels revealing that behind the passionate tragedy lies a dangerous truth.
cast: Felix Williamson, Heather Mitchell, Clare Bowen, Guy Edmonds

title: Vulnerable
des: A young couple are driving home after a dinner party with their four year old daughter when they are run off the road by a pair of drunken teenagers and left to die. After three days without food, water or any chance of being rescued, a loaded gun under the driver's seat may be their only way out.
cast: Emma Leonard, Radek Jonak, Kym Thorne, Jackson Heywood

title: Wurinyan
des: When two young Australians from seemingly different worlds struggle to find commonality, life experiences lead them to the realisation that they are not that different after all.
cast: Firdaws Adelpour, Christine Anu, Mark Coles Smith, Genna Chanelle Hayes

title: Miss Zahra
des: To find love you sometimes need to do strange things.
cast: Ville Myllyrinne, Tommi Liski, Vida Koivumäki, Outi Kärpänen

title: Hiraeth
des: Add a Plot
cast: Alban Ramosaj, Alesia Noka

title: All Mine
des: The choices to follow a path can lead to self destruction or self regeneration. Fabiola is faced with such choices. She is torn between an old habit and a new love. Billy is in love with Fabiola and can't help himself be drawn to her, despite deception and disappointment. Jason want everything that he believes is his despite the circumstances and this includes Fabiola. It is ultimately up to Fabiola to make a choice and pursue the path that will lead her to self discovery and regeneration.
cast: Zach Argyle, Sonja Suarez Carey, David B. Garrard, Taunya Gren

title: Mystery Daze
des: Young men and women awaken to find themselves being coupled together in a strange dreamworld.
cast: Ramzi Abed, Charlie Comet, Casey Cumz, Kinky Gaga

title: Unkosikazi Wokuqala
des: Add a Plot
cast: Nhlanhla Jon Lata, Nay Maps, Ronnie Mbatha, Slindile Nodangala

title: The Flight of the Bumblebee
des: This short story is been told almost as the flight of a bumblebee. The beginning of it's route is not traceable, it is twisted, knotted, some times there is no clear end to it. Everything happens in New Orleans, in the Bywater area, modern days. A trumpet player walks out of a bar. He meets a mysterious man outside that asks him if he can play the notorious Flight of the Bumblebee. The trumpet player tries to remember what he forgot. A cello player performing on the streets gets accidentally shot. Another man is forced to remember mistakes from his past as he meets an old friend. Two lovers share their last dance.
cast: Mysti Adams, Erika Ashley, Rodney Feaster, Andy J. Forest

title: Otis N' Dwayne
des: Two androgynous creatures embark on a psychotronic journey of self-discovery in a cruel, unusual, mostly male world in this dark comedy about two gay androids abandoned in a New Jersey suburb inhabited by God, the devil, and other lowlifes.
cast: Mark Arthur, Rebecca Brand, Erin Buchanan, Agatha Downing

title: Farewell to Hollywood
des: A nonfiction fairytale about love, death, art and the letting go.
cast: Henry Corra, Regina Nicholson

title: Philadelphia, Ti Amo
des: The pain of old memories paves the way for the pleasure of new ones.
cast: Rebecca Rittenhouse, Jeff Ayars, Eileen Cella, Nicole Davis

title: Untenable: Onverdedigbaar
des: Untenable (Onverdedigbaar) follows the story of a university student and her professor who cross a line and grapple with the personal and professional consequences, traveling far and wide to escape the past and find their future.
cast: Nele Van den Ende, Kevin Van Doorslaer, Noah Zeeuw, Lauranne Sebrechts

title: The Unruly Mystic: Saint Hildegard
des: The Unruly Mystic is an inspirational documentary of how the filmmaker reaffirms his life's work when he fell in love with a 12th century Saint.
cast: Michael M. Conti, Matthew Fox, Sofia Strehlow

title: Whipped
des: A Netflix overload causes mayhem.
cast: Jess Antrobus, Jeffrey Miles, JJ Obee, Ruben Sholinyan

title: Love Idiocrazy: He Loves Me, She Loves Me Not!
des: A couple love each other to death. They cling to each other until they explode like compressed atoms. One moment they pull away for their freedom, and in the next they snap back into each others arms. The typical fights over nothing build until they lead to wild sex or packed suitcases sitting by the front door.
cast: Jouri Smit, Heather Snell

title: The Mermaid Complex
des: After hiding in her world Disney fairy tale expectations, can girl finally meet boy and find her voice?
cast: Jessica Caplan, Zane Carney, Adrian Centoni, Brenton Duplessie

title: Producer Sam
des: Sam is a movie producer. He is 48years old and still single. Never married, but suddenly decides he wants a family. However, even with his hope, he has no idea how to build relationships as he lived single and free his whole life. The story finally deepens as he meets a Lisa, who is a widow and much younger than him. Considering the age gaps, the story illustrates the two characters' mental age as a serious, but interesting love-comedy.
cast: Derrick Bean, Bonzo, Sumiko Braun, Elf Butner

title: Catch of a Lifetime
des: Elaine Rose Chalmers has the perfect organized life. The host of her own Austin, Texas radio program, the self-proclaimed "Queen of Planning" spends her days advising callers on how charts, lists, and graphs can insure a peaceful, successful life and what results they can expect. But, what she doesn't expect is the result of one very disorganized evening back home in the little town of McIntosh, Florida. It seems that one recent "very hard to remember evening" with Billy Joe Crawley, her high school sweetheart, has changed a few things on Elaine's list. And now... she's unexpectedly expecting! A baby hadn't made her 2-year plan; she'd barely penciled it in at the bottom of the 5-yr goal sheet. And a one-night stand with a childhood friend hadn't exactly been on her to-do list, either! Join Elaine, Billy Joe and a host of city people and bunch of good olé southern folk as we watch how they deal with the one thing we all know is guaranteed in this life - change! Now it seems that for Elaine Rose Chalmers, host of Austin's #1 radio show "Charmed with Chalmers", an unexpected pregnancy forces her to learn that sometimes the best plan is not having a plan at all.
cast: Julia Denton, Matthew Ashford, Corinne Broskette, Nick G. Miller

title: Pillow Talk
des: An original web series about the quirks of monogamy and the complexities of human intimacy.
cast: Ezra Ani, Elya Yerushalmy

title: The Love Triangle
des: A dinner date ends in disaster when the waiter is an ex-boyfriend ready for revenge.
cast: Leonardo Foti, Catherine Hayden, Patrick Cronen, Alex Rose Wiesel

title: A Working Title
des: A reclusive artist finds himself in a deadly game after falling for a free-spirited young woman with a quick-tempered and dangerous boyfriend, all while under the shadow of the City of Sin.
cast: Elley Peart, Derek Feeser, Tavius Cortez, Billy Cameron

title: Abracadavers
des: Chris is a student whose mother dies in an untimely freak hair salon chair accident. Three years later, Chris is still struggling to cope with the loss, developing compulsive behaviours as well as an unhealthy attachment the the salon chair responsible for his mother's death. When Chris begins making claims about superhuman powers, his friends fear the worst. Hoping to help him move past his grief, they hatch a plan to stage an intervention, but they aren't the only ones interested in Chris' new 'abilities'.
cast: Jen Znack, Griffin Cork, Kiana Wu, Andrew Ellergodt

title: Stronger Together
des: Children start disappearing under similar circumstances. A father is forced to embark on his own investigation going against the polices direct orders.
cast: Jide Kosoko, Kunle Remi, Emem Ufot

title: In My Skin
des: A film that bridges gay themes with more universal youth themes: being comfortable with oneself and the heartbreak of first love. The story is about two gay boys in love, who must decide whether to come to terms with their sexuality, taking a risk to be themselves - and start a life that is true - despite the odds and pressures of high school. It is a short about the need to be comfortable with who you are in order to move forward in life.
cast: Tommy Dorfman, Daniel Fox, Robbie Stubbs

title: Marital Arts
des: A short film about the art of marriage.
cast: Amanda Greer, Joseph Cassese

title: Happy Playland
des: Billie Haare (Neenah Dekkers-Reihana), an anxious actress caught between her passion for stage, and her parents' dreams of the silver screens starts a new job at a desolate indoor playground, managed by wannabe-insta-star Cris (Jen Smith). Billie quickly develops feelings for social justice warrior, Zara (Dani Yourukova), who is sadly, 23 and not looking for anything serious. After a passionate moment in the ball pit, Billie and Zara both begin to question what they want. But the playland is soon to be closed - and Billie's anxiety can only handle so much. Cris decides to intervene. Can Billie woo Zara into forever and always? Will anyone end up Happy? Will Cris' trip to Queenstown increase her followers? Only time will tell, in the place where dreams come true, Happy Playland, The Wellington branch.
cast: Neenah Dekkers-Reihana, Dani Yourukova, Jen Smith, Maxwell Apse

title: Rough Draft
des: The film centers on a young screenwriter/classic film enthusiast named Charlotte and the budding romance she forms with an employee of a used bookstore as they attempt to piece together the life story of Tom Montgomery, a WWII-era screenwriter whose final work was lost when he was killed while serving overseas.
cast: Thuraya Elizabeth, Michael Robert Young, Bonnie Fairbank, Evan Reville

title: The Grey Matter
des: An office stiff wakes up in an alley mysteriously covered in blood. In the aftermath, he attracts the attention of his beautiful coworker, granting him a new lease on life ...but something strange is afoot.
cast: Ebon Moss-Bachrach, Lucy Walters, Carter Roy, Jason Griffith

title: Fear of Flying
des: A hapless mid twenties man gives up everything to move to LA to follow his girlfriend, and his dreams. When making it in Hollywood becomes harder than he thought, his relationship with his better half becomes strained. Now he must fight past his own insecurities, to see that all he needs, is right in front of him.
cast: Brett Rosenberg, Kat Tuohy, John Flores, Gary Private

title: The Hapless Love Life of Jesus Grey
des: Jesus Grey is a lucky man leading a charmed life. Fortuity of an almost biblical nature seems to follow him everywhere. But for all his luck he is an unhappy soul, he is desperate to meet a girl but alas, his love life is cursed.
cast: Emily Aitcheson, Isaac Andrews, Rachael Boulton, Joanne Bradford

title: All the Others Were Practice
des: Meet Jôrge. He's looking for his Mr. Right, but, well, you know how hard it is to meet new people. With the help of his friends and colleagues, Jôrge navigates setups, hookups, and the guy who works upstairs - in this sweet, truly independent romantic comedy.
cast: Charlie Ballard, Kimberly MacLean, Bennie Bell, Chris Morrell

title: Stall
des: Two close friends struggle with their sexuality and self identity.
cast: Kassandra Herzog, Lyle Lettau, Sam Richardson, Tonjha Richardson

title: Wajood
des: Wajood (Selfhood) revolves around a young hijra's(trans-woman) life, who seems to fancy herself with an auto-rickshaw driver. When confronted by the elders of her community about her unrealistic expectations goes on a subconscious quest to know if somebody will ever fall in love with her or is this thought as naive as told by everyone around her?
cast: Pranit Hatte, Randhir Chaudhary, Kshitij Gera, Madhuri Sarode

title: Treintañera
des: Valentina, torn between love and career, is persuaded by her Abuela to have a quinceañera party on her 30th birthday to help her find a man. On the same day she gets offered her dream job.
cast: Morgan Aiken, Orlando Pineda, Tina D'Marco, Tamara Bunker

title: (She Owns) Every Thing
des: Cathy, works at the handbag counter of a department store and is comfortably stuck in a passionless marriage. Cathy's world is turned on it's head when she falls in love with a woman who tries to buy a handbag from her. Cathy's life begins to unravel, she begins to yearn for sensations, feelings and things she has never owned before and when it all becomes too much she decides to transfer all her pain to a brown leather handbag.
cast: Maria Doyle Kennedy, Roisin Kiberd, Lola Peploe, Cynthia Fortune Ryan

title: The Things You Think I'm Thinking
des: A black male burn-survivor and amputee goes on a date with a regularly-abled man for the first time since his accident.
cast: Prince Amponsah, Jesse LaVercombe, Alice Snaden

title: Siamese Dream
des: Everyone remembers the first time they uttered the words 'I love you', potentially opening their heart to ridicule and immense pain. But on the other side of the coin, love is new and uncharted. Who knows what lies ahead? A young man goes to unusual lengths to prove his love in this quirky tale of romance. Siamese Dream explores how the dying art of originality and spontaneity can often be the best method to win a heart.
cast: Josh Karlik, Calypso Spendlove, Stephen Shinkfield, Melissa New

title: Alone Forever
des: Oliver can't help but wonder if his new tattoo is the cause of his recent spate of romantic bad luck. Gay and single in San Francisco, he spends a lot of time out and about meeting other like individuals. As he fails repeatedly to connect with any eligible bachelors and it seems that the pickings are getting slimmer and slimmer, he becomes more and more distraught over what could be the true meaning and power of his tattoo and whether it has doomed him to be alone forever.
cast: Theodore Kesner, Christopher Sugarman, Veronica Mannion, Alexa Fraser-Herron

title: I Don't Want to Kill Myself
des: When James fakes a suicide attempt to get his friend out of a DUI, he is sentenced to an out-patient recovery group for suicidal people, where he must convince everyone, including himself, that he doesn't want to kill himself.

title: Obsessed with Edgar

The only characters who appear and speak are a girl named Catharine and her long-time friend, Newt. The two had grown up next door to each other, on the fringe of a city, near fields and woods and orchards, within sight of a lovely bell tower that belonged to a school for the blind. Vonnegut tells the simplest of love stories illustrating the theme of natural response and listening to one's heart. One foot in front of the other, on the way to forever.

title: Prisoners of Time
des: Prisoners of Time is the story of two wounded souls who answer each other's cry for help, though they live generations and worlds apart. Willis James a Canadian war correspondent wounded in the Korean war and Rebekkah a young Quaker woman from the 17th century are suffering emotionally and physically. When their spirits connect they develop a love affair that sustains them through unbearable suffering but has a ripple effect in their respective worlds. As their lives intersect in strange and inexplicable ways, the people around them are impacted and the results are tragic. Unable to bear a life without Rebekkah, Willis withdraws from the world and retreats into himself. With their spirits freed of the physical limitations of time and space they find one another in a place where time and pain do not exist.
cast: Brian Asselin, Jeff Asselin, Astrida Auza, Simon Ayer

title: The Procession and the Bells
des: Is our fate hard-coded in our DNA, or is there something far deeper at work? The Procession And The Bells is an independent short film about a woman named L. Just L. She doesn't have a full name. And certainly not a full life. L is part of the Department of Hygiene and Physical Culture's mandatory breeding initiative. Despite her feelings for a gifted, but flawed young man, she's to be contracted to a mate on their statistical likelihood of producing genetically-appropriate children. Filmed beautifully by Can Turkyilmaz and directed by Laura Carnes, The Procession And The Bells is a dystopic fairy tale that tangles with issues of self-determination, reproductive technology and man's desire to control our own uniquely-human nature.
cast: Arma Fitzgerald, David Gallman, Jenna Hamiter, David Hickmott

title: Winter Has No Sun
des: Winter Has No Sun is ultimately a film about change. The story follows two lifelong friends; Jake & Ted and their choices that lead their lives to spiral out of control. Jake is a kindhearted guy that plays it safe in life; especially with the girl he's crazy for; Tori. When things don't go as planned for the two of them, Jake loses sight of his true character and seeks out the dangers and thrills that he thinks he's been lacking. Ted is a man blinded by love. He falls for a woman, Chloe, who is already taken by a man who abuses her mentally and physically. Ted tries to play the role of Superman with Chloe. But what he fails to realize is that he cannot change someone else if they are not willing to change themselves. His friendship with Jake starts to diminish when he starts keeping secrets and lies and falls into a rabbit hole of trouble which could possibly lead to his demise.
cast: Richard Abramov, Michael Lawrence Eisenstein, Darcy Wright, Elizabeth Raia

Feeling like she's wasting away at the age of 29 She wants to find some excitement in her personal life as she's found in her professional life as a successful author. However, she's married and bored. Skye finds an IM on her computer from a guy name Jessie/Jeff , saying he's is interested in meeting her.The bored Skye wants to accept his invite but the practical Skye realizes that she's married and she's not a cheater. Skye has no idea of what to do. All she knows is that she has to make a choice; Reply or Delete. Secrets have a way of finding us.

title: Grass Fed
des: Montreal actor/comedian Mike Paterson's health is no joke. The normally high-energy comic is desperate to overcome his debilitating sciatica back pain that conventional medicine hasn't been able to remedy. Mike obtains a legal medical marijuana prescription for his chronic pain and embarks upon an unconventional marijuana and hemp-infused diet that he supplements with exercise, vegetarian eating, no booze and sheer determination - all in an attempt to turn his health around and lose 50 lbs in the four months before his destination wedding in Mexico. As part of his adventure, Mike hits the road to pot meccas California and Colorado to immerse himself in their blossoming 'edibles' scenes and learn from local chefs, dispensary owners, advocates, and fellow patients how cannabis edibles are made and how they provide relief from pain. Medicine never tasted so good.

title: Behind Her Eyes

Although a heartbreaking journey, the strength of the two women is inspiring. This contemporary piece, aims to raise awareness for women's rights and create a hopeful outlook for those in similar circumstances, while evoking a feeling and leaving an impression on its audience through its visually striking imagery.

It uses magical realism to create a world where a person desperately in love could pull the moon from a neighbor's pond and use it to speak for the words he cannot say.

title: The Method of Love
des: On the surface, Chris Nduka is the picture-perfect man: charming, attractive and a very successful businessman. Women are enamoured and intrigued by him. However with his obsessive desires and preference for sex over love, committing to just one woman is as remote to him as taking a sabbatical to Tibet to be the Dalai Lama's understudy. In direct contrast, his newly wed brother Niko's enthusiastic show of love and romance, is at best nauseating and borderline uncomfortable to witness. He gushes over his wife April, in a fashion that suggests he is the first man on earth to experience such euphoria. But behind each brother's expression of love and affection, lies their troubled and dark childhood, that has rendered one brother obsessively in love with the idea of love, and the other incapable of showing love or forming a healthy relationship. Using London's buzzing streets as a backdrop, we witness the hazardous journey of self-discovery in the quest to find true love, through the lives of the show's central characters: The ambitious and confident Chloe, in a long-term relationship with successful video producer Anthony, struggles with recently developed feelings for another man which are both alarming and worrying, as they raise questions about her future with Anthony. Frankie, the overly confident, witty ladies' man and Chris' best friend, wears the exterior of a sexist egotistical male, who is happy to brag about female conquests. Beneath, however, he hides a deeper secret of insecurity and desperation for acceptance, that threatens not only to offer him a lifetime of misery but could be to the detriment of his friendship with Chris. Finally, we have the mysterious Charlotte, a widow who is still deeply grieving over the death of her husband, 2 years ago. She is struggling to find someone to live up to the impossible image her grief has created of her lost love, whilst in the meantime relying on less than perfect means to cope with each day. The Method of Love is a clever critique of the human condition, allowing us to navigate through the characters' innermost fears, passions and revelations, as each element of their lives continually forces them to question the very essence of love.
cast: Charles Venn, Alexandra Afryea, Tyler Fayose, Marsha Leanne Crosby

The film is based on the film A Beautiful Mind.

title: Stained

At his darkest hour he becomes the witness of Christmas Miracle, that serves as the very sign that he's been looking for to know that his son is okay and in God's hands. A miracle that brings together an elderly couple that were ripped apart by the Nazi's over forty-seven years ago when it was discovered that they were hiding their Jewish friends. A beautiful and tragic story of hope, faith and love.

title: Raye

Angelina's delusional hopes of making a better life for herself and her son gets blindsided by the sudden reappearance of her foul-mouthed, married-to-the-mob mother, CONNIE CAMPOLITARRO (Patty McCormack).

With "frienemies", like his roommate Brett, and temptation all around, where does he turn when things go south with everything? The truth may be stranger than any pulp romance novel that he's ever read. He's going to find that it's "the little things" that makes life so sweet.

Central themes include women choosing independence over a partner, the freedom of choice no matter the gender and the ever-changing face of romance.

title: My Heart Is an Idiot
des: My Heart Is An Idiot is a documentary about love that spans two years and over a hundred cities. The film captures Davy Rothbart's manic road-tripping lifestyle as he tours North America in a van promoting his magazine FOUND, an annual collection of discarded and recovered notes, letters, photographs, and ephemera. Along the way, Davy seeks advice on his tortured love life from a motley crew of characters (including Zooey Deschanel, Ira Glass, Newt Gingrich, and Davy's mom), and attempts to follow that advice, with alternately comical and tragic results. Like Sherman's March doused in Maker's Mark, My Heart Is An Idiot is a cautionary kiss on the lips of Generation Irony. When everyone has a strategy, love is unbelievable.
cast: Alexandra Gross, Sarah Locke, Javan Makhmali, Davy Rothbart

title: Un chant d'amour (nouveau)
des: A homage to Jean Genet's film Un Chant D'Amour (1950), two prisoners longing for human contact and affection, a transcendent friendship in a simple act of sharing a cigarette in this short ...                See full summary »

title: Missing You

Laura is painfully aware of her fast approaching 30th birthday and the fact that her dream of finding "the one" is still just a dream. title: Six Seconds
des: Scarlet; a broke English major is madly in love with Julian; a talentless artist with a hot temper. In a sequence of six second events their lives are turned upside-down. Shortly after becoming engaged, Scarlet unexpectedly gets pregnant, forcing Julian to get a steady job instead of pursuing his art. Scarlet is clearly overwhelmed with her own struggles to pass school, be a compassionate fiancé and prepare for motherhood while Julian comes to terms with giving up his ideal career. Resentment builds between the couple leading to a huge dispute that could be the end of them. Their lives pass them by so quickly they forget to be thankful for each second they share together. Julian leaves for work one night and neither of them take even six seconds to kiss or say goodbye. What happens in the next six seconds will change their lives forever.

He's racked up thousands of dollars in credit card debt and she's taken to wearing a tiara around the house. Now, tonight, as they venture forth to a dinner party at his boss's house, their secret life will be put to the ultimate test -- what comes first, love or the promotion?

Presented in a three-song suite structure, the film follows a troubled man who is married to a woman and in love with a drag queen. Without any dialog, the man's memories come alive through meaningful movement. Ultimately, his failed marriage and broken relationship with the drag queen bring him face-to-face with his choices, his future, and his happiness.

This fateful meeting occurred due to a misunderstanding between the two when Pak Harjo, Mikha's father was lost unfortunately due to an accident that happened when he was on the way to Tamparuli, Sabah. title: In the Robot Skies
des: In the Robot Skies is the world's first narrative shot entirely through autonomous drones. In collaboration with the Embedded and Artificially intelligent Vision Lab in Belgium the film has evolved in relation to their experiments with specially developed camera drones each programmed with their own cinematic rules and behaviors. Above a council estate tower block in London a network of surveillance drones monitor the residents below. Through the eyes of the drones two teenagers are kept apart, each held by police order within the digital confines of their own tower. Jazmin is a drone hacker and has hijacked and decorated one of the aerial cameras, scrawling messages on it with her marker, passing notes to her boyfriend Tamir in the tower opposite. In this near future city drones form both agents of state surveillance but also become co-opted as the aerial vehicles through which two teens fall in love.

title: Crescent
des: Do you remember how you see the world when you were a baby?This is not an ordinary LOVE story. This is about the First love of a boy who is only one year old. And through his eyes we will be able to see the world differently. For a moment, maybe we can be little more innocent, wondrous and little mischievous. I wrote this film last year when i became a mom. I've never expected that my world could be so different after having a baby. I was very isolated from the world, Yes sure that I was lonely. Most of time of his first year I was in his world instead of mine. In his world I looked for the way to communicate with the little one. That's his Eyes. He was talking through his eyes, there are emotions, and expressions. I was really passionated to figure out what he was trying to say with his eyes. That experience was amazing. So i got an idea, what if we can hear what they think? What if they talk with other babies like we do with friends? What if they fall in Love? Would that be the most innocent love in the world? That's how i started to write the piece. And working with babies, those eyes to see the world, absolutely beautiful to watch. I would love to share this with the world. There is nothing better than seeing our inner beauty. Thank you.
cast: Chelsea Amoroso, Jamie Flanagan, Sandra Herlog, Timothy Ryan Hickernell

title: My Step Kids
des: My Step Kids synopsis Romantic, Comedy, Kid's Rated G We have come to time in life were step parents are involved in a lot of raising kids all over the world. People fight temptations every day with stepping as new parents introduced to a spouses children, and they struggle to fit in. What makes that task the hardest of all is the children's rebelling attitude toward the step father or step mother. Mike is a young man that has found a new love of his life and want to make things serious to the fact of moving his girlfriend into to his home. A mother and 2 kids that has and still is dealing with the lost of the children's father 3 or 4 years earlier. The kids, a girl and a boy start by rebelling when they discover that their mother (Jackie) is planning to marry Mike. So they beginning terrorizing Mike to a degree that makes "Home Alone" seem like a cake walk, to the pranks they have in store for Mike, who fight's hard to still make it work, despite being laid off and has a new half a million dollar home like. Along the way he takes advice from different people that has been down that road, like his girlfriends step father who is in a interracial marriage with Jackie's mother, who are madly in love. Jim who is dealing with a deranged wife and 5 kids. Ron who is a cool laid back ladies man. Will who is a stone drunk, who passes out everywhere they go. Jackie turns to her two close friends Roxy and Stacey. Stacey is a sharp lonely female that has a weakness for the same old men. Roxy is a plump woman who is looking for a man, and is always the humor of the party. Through this all Mike and Jackie try to make everything work and try to make it to their wedding day, with out it all falling apart, by letting these two bad kids drive Mike away and crazy.
cast: Rhonda Beverly, Sean Spoatcoat Brown, Kyndall L. Dawson, Jerry Lynch

Paying homage to Film Noir, With This Ring explores the perceived notion that equality means joining the ranks of the mainstream, who not only have the right to marry, but also have the right to divorce; and with divorce comes a whole host of unexpected consequences.

title: Funny in Love
des: In some ways, Funny in Love is a simple love letter to the Modern Man and Woman, who have been struggling to find comfortable identities in relationship politics since the sexual revolution of the 60s. But it's also a tribute to the Female Goofball: either the girl in your office who can tell a dirty joke with the best of them, or the rare comedienne who breaks through the historically male-dominated world of professional comedy. To be a funny woman is to be a smart woman, and as Christopher Hitchens posits in his incendiary Vanity Fair essay, Why Women Aren't Funny, "Men do not want women to be funny. They want them as an audience, not as rivals...For men, it is a tragedy that the two things they prize the most-women and humor-should be so antithetical." With that observation setting the tone for the current culture of dating, our heroine Julie tries to find a place in romance where her wits and her sexuality aren't mutually exclusive qualities, and a funny lady can also be a sexy one.

title: Manic Pixie Dream Wife

Desperate, Chance turns to the internet for advice - but as his story unfolds, we start to see things from a whole new perspective: the manic pixie's. Questions of how they define themselves arise, and it becomes clear that each is playing a number of roles - but to what end?
cast: Amy Danneker, Cody Smith, Sharon Barto, Ashley Bagwell

title: Enjoy the Silence
des: A young woman sleepwalks while dreaming of her first female love.

title: Sizzling Rice
des: Scott, and his best friend/writing partner, Kevin, two struggling screenwriters, can't seem to catch a break. After a failed meeting with a powerful Hollywood agent, Kevin invites Scott, who's still reeling over the break-up with his ex-girlfriend, to a Chinese New Year party, hoping to distract themselves for a bit. There, Scott meets a beautiful and mysterious Chinese girl named Lijuan and is immediately smitten. Despite cultural and language barriers, Scott and Lijuan quickly develop a strong relationship that has a positive influence on Scott's writer's block. But when Lijuan's past catches up to her in America, Scott and Kevin find themselves caught in a deadly situation from which only Lijuan can save them.
cast: Tiffany Chu, Alan Chung, Jude Gao, Mark Holzum

title: Lane Woods Finds Love
des: Lane Woods, fresh out of a long term, serious breakup, chooses to work through (read as: distract himself from) his feelings by making a documentary about his attempts to get back out there and find a new love. With the help of his younger brother, Colin, Lane films himself as he goes on countless dates, hoping to catch those first sparks of love on film, instead he ends up documenting something much closer to reality.

title: Raspberry Cream
des: A Short Film about love, lust, and heartbreak as we follow two brothers' lives, seeing reality from their eyes. There is John, who is deflated, divorced, and trying to pick up the pieces to his life. John and his son move back to Los Angeles to be reunited with his brother. John's brother, Ben, is a womanizer who cares nothing about having meaningful, romantic relationships. As a matter of fact, that kind of relationship is the source of pain that has molded these two brothers into whom they have become as men. This is a story about perpetuating values to a teen while two brothers struggle to define what's important in their respective lives.

title: The Next Step
des: 'The Next Step' is the story of the quiet and self-conscious Richard Floyd, along with his three friends Will, Myles, and Stew. Upon entering their last year of high school, and knowing that after graduation the four will all be going on their separate ways, they decide to make it a year to remember and do anything they can think of together. However, when Richard meets the new girl Holly and quickly become almost inseparable, tension slowly builds between Richard and his friends, especially Will, who feels neglected and alienated by Richard. Things don't improve when Richard begins to think he's falling in love with Holly, even though she had insisted that they remain only friends.

title: Curiosity Killed the Cat
des: The last time Helen entered The Cup Coffeehouse, she broke up with her bi-sexual boyfriend whose gay side was suddenly overshadowing his straight side as he flirted with Jamie, the flamboyant male waiter, right in front of her. She is now entering the Cup enticed by her own sexual curiosity. She has been dating Pike, the infamous dyky waitress, and has come to visit her at work. Jamie can't help but warn Pike to not get too whipped by the "straight girl." The last time Gayle entered The Cup, she was informed that her daughter Stephanie was a lesbian. She was introduced to Stephanie's girlfriend Mary Ann and her unconventional reaction to all of this abrupt new information was astonishing. Gayle was not upset by her daughter's sexual orientation but rather very disappointed that Mary Ann was too boring and not nearly alternative enough to make her daughter's choice trendy. Gayle is now introducing the rainbow flag-flying coffee shop to Harold, a wealthy gay real estate broker. Jamie is instantly and surprisingly attracted to this older sugar daddy. Pike is freaked out when Mary Ann,with whom she has had a meaningless one night stand with, enters The Cup while Helen is there. Drama ensues as anger, jealousy, unexpected attraction and too much female as well as male estrogen explodes. What follows is a comedy of love-triangle errors made up of the most unusual combinations.
cast: Blanche Baker, Elissa Goldstein, Keith Collins, Samantha Artese

title: Mama Doesn't Know Best

She fondly recounts the events in her loving relationship with Sergio and unfortunate relationship with possessive mother Luisa. Katerina highlights on the continuous attempts Luisa made to break up her relationship Sergio which climaxed to finally give her inspiration to write a great song whose performance at the restaurant inadvertently leads to her discovery by a popular music producer that propels her to the doors of fame.

title: Two Men in a Boat: Chasing Spring

This chance-heard quote struck Jeremy Norman as an intensely romantic notion, and, along with his partner Derek Frost, he set out to find the proof. Chartering Kalani, an 80-foot, twin-screw motor yacht, they set out on an amazing journey, chasing spring up the west coast of the British Isles. This charming film documents their extraordinary odyssey.

Throughout her last days in the country, and amongst all the little things she still needs to sort out before she leaves, Sally finds herself getting closer and closer to Tom, something she can not help, despite it going against her own reasoning. Confronted with what she most wanted when she least expected it, Sally is about to learn that love is full of choices.

The Hedgehog Dilemma is a naturalistic, improvised film about communication, and the tragic inability of most humans to effectively connect with another person on a deeper, emotional level. Through Sam and Mike's relationships, we come to understand a bit about being young in the city, and the isolation faced by Generation Y.

We will see how his cranky self suddenly becomes confident and hopeful when he finds out that his high school sweetheart Isabel also comes to the Center.This is a story about aging and a quest for lost love, which we don't commonly associate with old age. It's not a tale about old age, neither a conventional love story. This is a story about chances, and how it is never too late to get what you hoped for in life. It's a story that highlights Walter's journey and his determination to finish what he started 50 years ago.

title: Shun Pong O

She escapes reality by living life in her dreams cape until one day she meets a Korean boy, Park Ji Hoon (by Ho Won Kim). His presence has a strong impact on her and eventually changes her over time. An unforgettable love story unfolds after a mysterious incident. With this, their relationship strengthens and the love they have for each other deepens. One day, Park Ji Hoon suddenly leaves without any words. After he leaves, Shinny misses him so much that she decides to look for him and tell him her feeling. Would she successfully find him and find out the answer why he leaves suddenly?

She turns to her closest friends, Sidonia (Bonnie Piesse) and Tesla (Romy Valentina), and her brother Enzo (Francesco Plazza) for support. Meanwhile, Quinn (James Gill) lost everything to his girlfriend, Nilda, while his friends, Fera (Terilyn Marshelle-Fleming) and her husband, Camden (Jorell Stills Haigler) keep a close eye on him. Two lives shattered, but pain doesn't have to last forever.

He and the Sergeant Zinaida Zasyekina (Satoko Enmei) go to Hokkaido to monitor an ex-officer of Self Defence Force of Japan, Toshio Honda (Taiyo Sawa). Honda has killed 27 people including his colleagues, and is hiding in a mountain with a mysterious beauty, Risa (Riho Yoshioka).

title: In Between the Gutter and the Stars
des: If you've ever been in love, had your heart broken, or found your soul mate, you'll be entertained and touched by this offbeat, gender-bending, coming-of-middle-age, love story. FANNIE (30s), an actress dreaming of stardom, can barely eke by in a vacuum of emotional and financial hopelessness. She doesn't realize that the curve balls that life is pitching her way bring extraordinary gifts (including the possibility of love), if only she'd step up to bat. In her life is DANIEL (30s), an unusual paramour, who is the marvelously balanced embodiment of his male and female personae. However, his self-confidence is challenged by his inability to woo Fannie. Together, they make an unusual pairing, but one that is perfectly suited for each other despite their charming 'oddities.'

title: Modern Romance

Fearing loss of losing his new found love, Dave opts not to tell the roommate -- with disastrous results. From the mind of 17 year old writer/director J.D. Lifshitz comes this warped modern day tale of love and the lengths people will go to for romance.

title: If You Dare Desire ...
des: February, 2011. In a small village of West Bengal - Swapna and Shucheta - two young women in love with each other - took their own lives, leaving a letter claiming love, life, recognition... a letter challenging violence, hate, invisibilisation. No one from their families came to claim their dead bodies. They died as they dared to love. Their bodies remained unclaimed by family and society. What if they were not dead but alive today? Like many other couples, Aparna-Kajlee from Bongaaon, Moyna-Bandana from Purulia... They died for love but still live among us. What if Swapna and Shucheta ran away and survived? How would their life together look like and their desire? If you dare Desire, is a film of possibilities. Beyond the domination of patriarchy and hetero-normativity, the women in love resist with their bodies, with their hearts. They live many lives. They die many deaths. They resist and they dream. In the daily struggles of a far-away village. In the dark glitters of a big city. If you dare Desire, is a wish-fulfilling cinema. A hyper-reality of desire. A politics of hope. Welcome to the many worlds of Swapna-Shucheta. Dare to dream, and desire!
cast: Manisha Adak, Manisha Bilkish, Farha Khatun, Gautam Mukherjee

title: Anime Fan Tom
des: Anime Fan Tom sees himself as a hero in his fantasies but in real world he is a dorky geek. Tom meets a Japanese girl Mika who loves anime on the Internet. Her suggestions prompt Tom to go through life changing decisions.

title: Hide Your Eyes
des: Anabel invites her ex girlfriend, Hanna, to come see her new apartment with the hope of getting her back. The day arrives and Hanna rings the doorbell. It takes the unorganized Anabel by surprise and she runs around trying to organize her stuff. She lets Hanna in for breakfast served in the middle of the mess. During breakfast Anabel gives Hanna a present, which she refuses to accept. The mood changes in the apartment and Hanna tries one last time to confront Anabel about the rumors of her infidelity, which caused their break-up. Hanna wants the truth and Anabel just wants her. Are they going to get back together or will they go their separate ways?

title: Avani

title: As You Were

Through the ever-changing landscape, Guohui and Peiling realise that what is transitory is also eternal.

title: Fading Away
des: Fading Away showcases a series of never before told stories from a group of unique Korean War veterans and refugees through a series of insightful interviews and the use of rare historical film footage, photos and other archival material. These veterans and survivors share their stories in their own words with their sons, daughters and grandchildren with memories of catastrophe, fear, and the pains they vividly remember. The film is divided into seven parts, strung together and led by the powerful recollection of the journey of a 13 year-old Korean War orphan who fled the North to the South as he recalls his memories and emotions of the war. The film also showcases a love story of an American couple who met during the Korean War, as well as the unique perspective of several female soldiers who for the first time ever now share their humorous and very personal emotional moments during the war and its impact on their lives today.
cast: George Ahn, Mary Ahn, Thomas Y. Chung, Bong Keon Kim

title: The Last Generation

cast: Tracy Clark, Clem Coleman, Thomas Crowley, Shan Evans

title: Creep
des: Sam King (Ken McGraw Jr) is a seemingly mild mannered, insecure individual who has come to develop a long-standing crush on the emotionally vulnerable Jamie Crane (Leah Voysey), the babysitter for his next-door neighbors. Sam recognizes that Jamie is stuck in an abusive relationship with her vindictive boyfriend, Travis Ridley (Steven Brandt), and wants nothing else but to love her. When Sam attempts to express his pure feelings of love towards Jamie, he ignites the fury of Travis and sparks a fire that he isn't able to control. No one is aware of what the others are capable of and the lives of the three individuals collide with visceral emotions that catalyze a series of violent acts of passion that spiral our of control and will change all three forever.
cast: Ken McGraw Jr., Leah Voysey, Steven Brandt, Marykerin Naughton

title: Captivating Carla
des: This feature film is a romantic comedy about a woman who recognizes that her loop of unsuccessful relationships is causing her too much misery. Not a story for twenty year olds, this one looks at how people find themselves living in one place, but notice they are happy in another place. A decision has to be made about staying in that unfulfilling loop or breaking out of it and embracing change. In this story, Carla shares her relationship disappointments with Leo, her guy buddy who listens patiently and supportively to her agonizing over frustrating experiences. Unbeknownst to Carla, Leo has concealed a passion for her and has decided to kidnap her away for a weekend at a quiet B and B in a last-ditch effort to convey this. With a couple of interesting twists, the weekend is about the captivating of Carla, and what her decision will be.

title: No Rest for the Wicked

Along the way we study the moral and social implications of living life as wanted but reluctant criminals have on their relationship. If 'Badlands' and 'The Getaway' had a baby, while 'True Romance' and 'Bonnie and Clyde' had a baby, and THEIR babies had a baby... No Rest for the Wicked would be the result. The difference that makes No Rest unique is an eclectic mix of modern action with an European/Eastern philosophy and style in it's rendering.
cast: Kathy Gardiner, Josh Hayes, Frederick Szkoda, Erin Tjoe

title: You

title: This Time Tomorrow

Though not entirely convinced of impending doom, Stacey convinces Parker to embrace the notion that this might be the end, and she agrees to spend the day with him, making sure to fit as much into these final moments as possible. Stacey and Parker bump into old friends and fall into old patterns, all the while struggling to embrace the present and not focus on the past.

title: Love Is a Thieves' Game

Melinda falls for his principles and philosophical talks, Where she learns real love is from Soul and not from Heart! Chris is reluctant to get in to relationship because of the incompatibility. title: Pink & Green

When Mario's work visa is not renewed he seeks an immigration attorney where he finds out his four year relationship with Adam doesn't count for anything in terms of immigration. The only way he can legally remain in the country is marrying a woman. With just two months left on his visa, Mario sets out to find a wife who is believable enough to fool the INS. His search for the 'perfect match' takes him on a wild journey filled with comical and tragic situations.About to give up, he unexpectedly meets Linda, a sweet lesbian who agrees to marry Mario under a strange condition: he will need to get her pregnant first!

The glam our of Dynasty meet the wholesomeness of the Cosby's with the Action Thriller of Die Hard With A Vengeance.

Known as a bunch of lazy teenagers, this ministry's activities has been limited to church movie nights and game nights. Once Casey is hired, the ministry is challenged to step out of their comfort zone and do something big for Jesus Christ. Will the youth group prove that they are capable of doing the extraordinary? Or will they crumble under the pressure and prove the naysayers right?

title: Cat Sitting

title: Ryan & I
des: Once upon a time there was a little girl named Donna and her best friend Ryan. They grew up together in Goa and were practically inseparable, but, in a turn of fate, Ryan's family had to move to England and Donna lost her only friend. As they were parting, the made a promise to meet each other 20 years from that day at 5PM under the Big Ben. Life goes on and they never see each other again in the years that follow. After two decades, Donna who is now a Graphic Designer in London, accidentally finds a tin toy box from her childhood which reminds her of the promise. What happens next? Does Ryan remember too? Do they meet again? Find out in this beautiful film about childhood, friendship and chance happenings.

title: Yabanci
des: Haymo (Mehmet Dundar) or Ishak, in his real name, is a political refugee who has tried returnless journeys since his childhood with the feeling of inadequacy in his existence and lived the last 20 years as a stateless in Eastern Europe. With his two friends he sought refuge in the Lavrion Refugee camp on the other side of the border by swimming the Meric River from Turkey to Greece. He works in orange and tobacco gardens with friends during his days at the camp and begins a long, quiet love life with Albanian refugee Eleni (Anastasya Yildiz), with whom he arrived the camp in the same truck. His path passes through his country once again after many years. He meets Safak (Gokben Dervis) who is an idle young girl living in a kortejoda (a house where the Jews live together) of a older neighborhood of Izmir with her mother and her brother. She has a forbidden relationship with Haymo's blind brother, Avaz (Bekir Anniak). Her indifference to taboos and bans brings her closer to Haymo and with this intimacy a new adventure will begin in her life.
cast: Mehmet Dündar, Gökben Dervis, Bekir Anniak, Sebnem Dogruer

title: Room Enough

title: The Legend of Lady White Snake

A meditation on obsession, identity, metamorphosis, changing gender and time, through cross-cultural poetry perspectives. Starring fashion icon the Honorable Daphne Guinness (Academy Award nominated Cashback), directed and written award-winning photographer Indrani, as a tribute to the spirit of Alexander McQueen, costume design/production design by GK Reid.

title: Two Worlds Apart

In these dreams he meets a beautiful girl named Jessica. Slowly Alex begins to take more and more of these pills to return. Alex is faced with a crucial decision, to stop abusing these pills and live his old depressing life, or continue taking these pills at the risk of his own well-being but assuring his artificial happiness.

des: Oh I lost my legs! is a 2014 short film set in Paris directed by Natasha Rodriguez and written by Alex Broun (original name: Saturday Night Newtown Sunday Morning Enmore). It tells the story of Claire who wakes up with no memory from last night's events and next to Sasha a pretty but weird young girl. Claire tries to run away but gets busted by Sasha. Claire starts realizing that maybe she doesn't want to leave anymore. FOR CULTURAL PURPOSES ONLY, NO COMERCIAL VALUE./ SIN VALOR COMERCIAL. PARA FINES CULTURALES

title: Suitcase of Love and Shame
des: A forbidden love story played out in a decade that would soon spawn the sexual revolution. Part historical documentary and part experimental narrative the film reconstructs a mesmerizing and erotic narrative from 60 hours of reel-to-reel audiotape discovered in a suitcase. Recorded in the 1960's by a Mid-western woman and her lover they chronicle the details of their adulterous love affair. Reliant on recording devises to document and memorialize their affair the tape recorder evolves as a confidant, witness and participant, always omnipresent creating a welcomed threesome. Mirroring the compulsion to confess ones indiscretions in today's Internet world these captivating recordings speak to an audience that can remember Bert Parks as well as one who has never set finger to a rotary phone.
cast: Jane Gillooly

title: Between
des: Chelsea Hollis is very successful and has been divorced four times. She helps people fix their relationships but has totally given up on love. Everything changes when she meets Scott Hamilton and a one-night stand blossoms into a romantic relationship until she finds out that the man who is about to change her perspective on love, may just be much more than what she expected.

A cynic. A traipser, a trespasser, a miscreant, and a thief; Renata is a lovely contradiction... and a liar. Starring Alexandra Clayton and featuring original songs written and performed by Clayton, I THINK IT'S RAINING, is a music-infused San Francisco portrait of a young woman at odds with who she once was and who she will become.

title: The Creepy Guy
des: The Creepy Guy is a short film shot in a park in North Los Angeles; it depicts how hard it is to approach women when a man has social inadequacies, and also how hard the single scene is. Ben/the creepy guy has a friendly disposition and is well known in this park; he is a nice person but has little social skills and major boundary problems. The moral of this story is that women who dump nice guys for muscular men can get hurt, because these men can be players, like in the case of Troy. Also, if you are a man who goes around approaching women in creepy ways, do not do that anymore.

Left with nothing but reminiscence of his work and inspiration, Sonia must seek out her husband from the shadows and bring him back to reality. A biopic fan fiction based on the stories and romantic history of H.P. Lovecraft and his wife Sonia Greene.

title: My Anime Girlfriend
des: Sid, a data entry technician, is set up on a blind date with his co-worker's pal 'Yuruki', and is shocked to find out that she is quite animated -- literally. She's a Japanese animation archetype living in a world of live-action human beings. After Yuruki and Sid embark on a whirlwind romance, the age-old question will be answered: can a human being make it work with a 2-dimensional heroine from Asian action cartoons?

title: The Magnificent Imagined Life of Sherry Sherman and Her Fantastic Couch
des: The Magnificent Imagined Life of Sherry Sherman is a full-blown passion project - the result of a collective obsession with Wes Anderson, Magic Realism and the convenient presence of an old couch rotting in one of our bedrooms. It was made with naught but love and sponsored pizza. Sherry Sherman is a quirky, naive young girl with an incredibly colourful imagination. When she comes across a charming old couch in a second-hand furniture shop, it sets her off on a fantastic train of thought about the strange and wonderful things she may experience with this couch in her life... until real life gives her a rather rude awakening.

A naive and privileged young woman, (Evie), is rescued from danger one night by an unsuspecting hero, (Baxter), who brings a breath of fresh air to Evie's conservative life. After a misunderstanding tears them apart, Evie embarks on a journey of personal discovery, joined by unwilling participant and best friend, (Poppy), to find Baxter. Will they let society and circumstance come between them? 'Home Free' is an unconventional story with the underlying issue of homelessness and it's place in society. A real modern 'Lady and the Tramp' tale.

Soon they are down and out and about to give up. Suddenly they are discovered by a notorious B movie producer, Duke Klein, who mistakes Valentine for former child actor Tommy Benjamin. Soon they are caught up in the film industry, mistaken identity and deception. Drama, comedy and romance ensues.

title: Rocky Must Die
des: Elmo Rocco is a professional and ruthless contract-killer who operates with a strict set of rules, and whose jobs never hit the morgue. Elmo and his sidekicks, Tony and Fred, spend their time in-between jobs watching film noir classics and eating popcorn. Mark, an investment banker, loves Suzanne, his fiancée, and wants to marry her. Suzanne loves Mark, but she also loves Rocky. Mark sees Rocky as an obstacle to his marriage to Suzanne, and hires Elmo to kill him. Elmo has had it with love triangle jobs, but the promised money for the job on Rocky, forty thousand dollars, is very appetizing. What looks like a textbook job will prove to Elmo that, in his long, successful and busy career, he hasn't seen it all.

title: Blurred

In this world Rob and Vic fell in love with each other. To Rob, Vic was everything. She simply was the first woman to make his heart beat. To let him know what does it mean to be in love. To Vic, Rob was another man helping her trying to define herself. This is the story about how that precious love ended. Because in a World where love is not an opinion, there's no room for lies or doubts, only for memories and regrets.

Things don't go as planned for Richard when he finds out that his estranged brother and wife does not welcome him with open arms. Richard goes to the local bar to relieve some stress when he encounters Atlanta native Rish Utley (Thomas Mackey). Richard loses his memory and replies on the assistance from Rish to help him navigate through the ATL on an evening they'll both never forget.

title: Under the Grecian Sun: Crete

This inspiring and entertaining cultural culinary travel documentary combines wisdom with humor and delicious visuals to explore the people, places, ancient archaeology, cuisine, working village farms and the birthplace of the longevity-enhancing Mediterranean Diet and lifestyle.

title: William Shakespeare's a Midsummer Night's Dream
des: This un-abridged fresh take on William Shakespeare's riotous comedy "A Midsummer Night's Dream" is the truest adaption to Shakespeare's original text yet to see the screen. A tale of wonder, magic, love, and mayhem, "A Midsummer Night's Dream" follows the lovers Lysander and Hermia, as they run away to the woods to try and escape the wishes of Hermia's father, Egues, that Hermia shall marry Demetrius. Unbeknownst to Lysander and Hermia, they are followed into the woods by Demetrius, trying to foil their plain, and Helena, trying to win the love of Demetrius. These lovers paths then cross with the fairy King Oberon, and his mischievous servant Puck. Wishing to help these lovers, Oberon dispatches Puck with a love potion. But things do not go as planned, and hilarity ensues.

Filled with crazy characters like his 'Your momma' joke-telling best friend, his monologuing ex-girlfriend, a slap-happy girl of his desires and a boss who dates all of his ex-girlfriends off the rebound - 'Unconscious' is a small budget film with big ideas that showcases the extremely talented community of Flagstaff Arizona.

He's gone on many dates with fantastic women, but just when it comes time for that goodnight kiss, he is plagued by terrible visions of mouths. Of swishing. Of spit. Then, Paul meets Carla, the girl of his dreams, and his sialophobia becomes too much to bear. Now he must do whatever it takes to keep Carla and finally get his first kiss, even if it means some radically unconventional therapy.

The lead actor in the role of the old man is a neighbor of the director. He acted in English, but he doesn't know a word of English. The lead female is also non non-actor. The screenplay has been chosen amongst nearly 2000 screenplays for a special project called '50 Kisses'. Stare Y won best director in London on February the 14th. Love's a Bitch (and then you die) is a caustic ode to the indie love of the new millennium. They decide to take on the investigation on their own, driving Mickey's car through the suburbs trying to find the killer. Going from bar to bar, hearing the weirdest stories, they become closer and closer, until the summer reaches its end and they must face their own issues.

Saira and Kevin fall in love after she is cast to play the lead in Kevin's independent feature film, but her drug addiction comes in the way of her creative pursuits and her fragile relationship with Kevin and threatens to destroy everything she aspires to be.

title: The Year We Thought About Love
des: What happens when LGBTQ youth of color band together and dare to be 'out' on stage about their lives and their loves? The cast of True Colors: OUT Youth Theater transforms their struggles into performance for social change. With wit, candor, and attitude, the troupe captivates audiences surprised to hear such stories in school settings. Our characters include a transgender teenager who is kicked out of her home, a devout Christian who challenges his church's homophobia, and a girl who likes to wear masculine clothing, even as she models dresses on the runway. After the Boston Marathon bombs explode yards from their rehearsal space, the troupe becomes even more determined to share their stories of love to help their city heal.

title: The Railroad

The Railroad is now a short film that the cast and I would love to share with everyone. It's a heavy topic but one that needs exploring because of the many lives that are wrapped up in the spiral of addiction. Whether you are surviving with addiction or involved with the effects of it, this short story is meant to open up a dialog about what may be done to reach out, to help, to cope, to care, and most importantly, to help others survive with love in the face of these great challenges.

Eric, very egotistical and arrogant has no plans of settling down with just one woman, but Candy has a different game plan. Taking the attitude of 'whatever it takes' to make him hers, she soon learns local in-house 'groupies' will not make her task easy. Candy operates as smoothly as she can without becoming a victim of the 'groupie status' by consulting with family, friends and associates, all of which are involved with Eric in some situation or another on how she can make him fall in love with her.

title: The New Thirty Movie

Unappreciated by her husband Deek (Chris Gregson), Molly finds it hard to enjoy her birthday. A quirky cavalcade of friends and family show up and push Molly toward a change. Created by a cast of seasoned improvisers and industry pros, this independent film from Director Candice Colbert was filmed in 24 hours for a budget of less than 500 dollars, Behind the scenes and on the screen, The New Thirty Movie is a triumph of the community surrounding one woman facing the age some call 'The New Thirty.'

title: The Chrysalis Tide
des: When their father was killed in action during the Vietnam War, Anthony Elders made a vow to always take care of his baby brother Michael. A promise that was not always easy to keep, given Michael's affinity for mischief. Growing up, they spend many a day fishing the waters in their small town near Savannah, Ga. Fishing became the opportunity for Anthony to impart wisdom and in general, correct his brother's impish behavior. Anthony was the old soul having grown up overnight to become the man of the house. Michael, though as intelligent as Anthony, remained wide-eyed; seeing only the possible and refusing to entertain the improbable. Despite this, the boys were more alike than different. No two brothers were closer and they often talked about fixing up their father's old decrepit boat and sailing the world together. Fast forward to the mid 90's. Michael, graduates from Annapolis and is serving overseas as a Navy Seal. Anthony, a helicopter pilot serves stateside. On a beautify southern, spring afternoon, The Elders a family (minus Michael) along with friends and neighbors take a canoe trip on the river. Among them are a young school friend Amir and his sister Nadia, a medical student. When their perfect day becomes a perfect nightmare, Nadia comes to the rescue...but not without personal tragedy. From that day on, Nadia and the Elders share a family-like bond. In 1999, a catastrophic earthquake hits Turkey. Nadia and Michael, each in Turkey on their own relief missions, cross paths and meet for the first time. Their connection is powerful and nearly instant. Though Nadia is Muslim, (and promised to another man) they pursue an ill-advised "friendship" that will likely bring them both pain. Like the bird who loved the fish, it seemed as though they were two creatures, unable to exist in the other's world. A fact that Michael, ever the optimist, refused to accept. On September 11, 2001, the face of America changed forever. In the midst of tragedy, Nadia and Michael find their way just before both men head to war. Their plans to sail around the world would have to wait until after their return.
cast: Desiree Markella, Joshua Loren, Joshua Mascareñas, Suanne Braun

title: The Suitor
des: The Halloween's Eve of 1938, Orson Welles broadcast a radio adaptation of War of the Worlds. Thousands of radio listeners witnessed what they thought it was the End of the World. The narration of a presumed alien Invasion caused numerous panic scenes in New York City and many other places in the country. Heart attacks, nervous breakdowns, people screaming on the streets... All those stories are well known nowadays. Unlike The Suitor story. The Suitor is a fiction film about a lonely man that thanks to this radio show, had the chance to spend one night in companion. The happiest night of his life.

title: Imber's Left Hand
